choices: You are found by a bad human.
You are found by a good human.
You are not found and wake alone.
You landed in a famer's field.
You went through a portal before landing.
1.content:
You woke up in an enclosed space that barely fit your tiny body. You were immediately swelled with information but none of it made sense. Well some of it did, like how to fly, walk, run, eat, and a host of other abilities that you had no business knowing but did.

You were what was known as a Dark Hunter King. The title “King” was given when a Dark Hunter was born that had a defect. Dark Hunters were essentially the top species of Dragon in this realm. They ruled far above in the peaks where their scales could be fed by the sun. The realm you were in was known simply as Base realm. Basically your realm was shared between Dragons; who ruled over the predators and animals and of course the Dark Hunters were the strongest Dragons. The humans were extremely advanced in magic and most of all in portal magic. Most of the dragons in other realms came or originated from the breeds from Base Realm. Because of this the Dragons protected the humans so they could send their children to live in other realms if it became too crowded and food was scarce.

The Dark Hunters were pretty much like the Spartans. At birth, if they had any defects what so ever they were thrown off their home peak and were left to plummet to the ravines below. Dark Hunters identical look was one everyone knew in this realm; Their scales, bones, and other outside parts were so jet black that they were invisible in the dark. They had retractable spikes and horns that could cover their body or retract for human riding and other than individual features the females had glowing blue eyes while the males had orange. The only other color eyes was when a King was born and had glowing red eyes. There were maybe 20 of them in all and a Queen was the one in charge. Dark hunters were the biggest, strongest, fastest,… of dragons while most dragon’s size maxed out at 150 feet long Dark Hunters maxed out at 300 and that was what the queen was. However she didn’t allow any other Dark Hunter get over 200 feet long or they would be able to challenge her for leadership. She would kill those who reached that point and breed more.

They had an almost backwards society. Female Dark Hunters were in charge and overall more impressive both in size and intellect. Males were basically grunts but as they were weaker and smaller than the females they were kept out of site in chained cells and used exclusively as breeding machines. The only exception to this was, once in every 50 generations a King was born that was not only capable of unknown power but also had the genetic memory of all the Kings that came before, including their power and learned abilities. One of those abilities was the reason for their immediate extermination was the ability to turn human at will while retaining all his draconic abilities, including transforming parts of himself, like growing wings or a tail out of his back when needed. Other than their eyes, the only way to know for sure that a baby was a King was that he would hatch as a human than transform as into a dragon. Kings were hated and despised and while they were just like any other newborn after hatching, they could grow to the full size of 500 feet long and able to understand all the genetic memory at the age of 12. Kings were the biggest threat to a queen so if for no other reason they were slaughtered for that reason.

You banged on the inside of your shell with your tiny fists, trying to get out. You heard the squeaking and roaring outside as your apparent brothers and sisters were breaking free. You so much wanted to join them but these human fists were not working and even though you didn’t know how you knew but you did know that once you hatched you would be able to transform into a proper dragon. But now was the task of getting out. Then a thought out of nowhere came. You extended you arm and then out of your wrist you protruded a spike that you guessed would be one on your dragon body if you were in that form. You used it on the shell and finally it cracked. You brought your spike back into your arm and with all your might recoiled and slammed into the crack you made. The shell broke and the pieces flung away from you as you collapsed in the sudden freezing temperature of the outside world.

You looked up to see a huge snout looking at you that you immediately rendered as your mother. You were about to get up when another series of spasms came and then immense pain as your body began changing. You cried and screamed as your body was ripped apart and your dragon body was formed. Finally you were free of the pain and lay, whimpering and screeching like the other baby dragons. What happened next was cemented into your mind. When you got up and looked longingly into your mother’s eyes she looked back into yours with utter hate and disgust. Then, without warning she snarled and caught your body in her jaws then bit down and sank her fangs into you.

“You are no son of mine.” She said after a few chewing motions than spit you off the mountain and into blackness. Your last site of her was her grinning and hate filled eyes with her mouth dripping with your blood. You lost consciousness as you plummeted down to your death. That is when your wings spread out on their own. You were doing it but not consciously. They caught the wind and you bagan to glide down until after a day your body hit the ground and you came to a stop. Your wounds were already healing but at the size of a large rat you were extremely vulnerable as it stood but at least you were alive, for the moment.
1.title: A King is born.

11.content:
Sporadically you go in and out of consciousness. When you came to it would be because something shook you awake and when you saw you were in a cage and the person holding it saw your eyes open he grinned then shook the cage violently. The pain from your wounds would force you back into unconsciousness and this happened enough for you to actually prefer the nightmares of your mother trying to kill you. However, finally you woke as you were dumped out of your cage and into a larger one. Whatever time in the sun had healed your wounds nicely but they were still sore as you flopped onto the ground below a human before he left and a few more came into your… cell to evaluate you.

“Lord Scar be careful. He may be an infant but he is still a dragon and capable of much damage.” Said one of the humans which only got the fat man that had bent over to look at you closer to straighten and snap his fingers to the man. The man was taken away and thrown to a pack of lions, who greedily tore the man to pieces.

“Anyone else feel like giving me orders?” asked the human known as Lord Scar to which no one addressed it and he put his nose up then looked down at his new prize… you.

You were limping around your cage now as you smelled the area up to the bars and was snapped at by the animals in the neighboring cages. You didn’t know why but you were getting a bad feeling about this and somehow you were already disliking the fat human that was giving the orders. He was large and tall, nearly 7 feet tall and easily 400 pounds and not of muscle. His bald head and plump features adorned with a single scar across his face were masked with expensive and overcompensating clothes and jewelry. You whimpered at his gaze and as you backed away from the clawing animals in the cages next to you, trying to get at you as if you were their next meal.

“No, this won’t due. Rose!” Called Lord Scar to which a very young but fit young lady appeared and you could smell different animal scents on her, both alive and dead. He grabbed at her butt and massaged it before separating and going toward you, giving you a swift kick that made you fly against the nearby and back wall. You crumbled to the floor and whimpered there as you looked up at the cruel man. “I was told I got a dragon, not this whimpering piece of trash. You are no longer tied to any of the other animals. This is your main priority from now on. You will make me a fierce dragon…”
11.title: You are found by a bad human.

115.content:
“I want this weak excuse of a dragon to get the best care. I want him as obedient and as good looking as possible. That means none of this… weak and pathetic garbage. When I have guests I want them to marvel at what I have, not be disgusted with it. Do this…” he said as he looked at the dragon with a glint in his eyes then came over as if to entice her to do his bidding rather than threaten her. “... and I will make sure you are the richest and well looked after servant in all my empire.” He whispered into her ear. It was obvious from her heartbeat that she was more disgusted with him then appealed, but for the sake of being fed to one of his animals or the dragon he was referring to she played along.

“It will be done my lord.” She said as she continued to play along to which he grinned evilly then headed for the door.

“Oh, and one more thing. Make sure that the little monster is used to the taste of fresh human meat. You have our entire dungeon and staff to choose from.” Lord Scar said as if he just thought of it as a brilliant idea.

“Of course my lord.” Rose replied as she bowed to his exit.

As soon as he was out and the others were out of sight she bent down to you and picked your currently fragile body up. Unlike the evil human, she was tender in her touch and soothing to be around. She sat against the wall and took something out of her pocket. It was some king of herb and she applied it to what remained of your wounds. You growled slightly as she touched them but she continued and soon your growl was a purr as she made the previously injured spots painless. By the time she was done she found you purring and nuzzling into her hand.

“Hello little one. I know you are young but is there a chance you can understand me?” she asked as if hoping you could to make her job easier. You cocked you head in confusion as the strange words rang in your ears. “Then this is going to be harder to accomplish than I thought. Unlike the other animals they have me train, you are the first with a mind. I know you will eventually be able to understand but even so. You should know that while we both are going to have to do some things we don’t like, we are in it together.” She said as she pet you and you moved into her touch.

You didn’t really understand yet what was going on but this human female was the first nice person that you met and you instantly felt a connection with her. The current events happened so fast that you adopted her as your mother to hopefully erase what your actual mother had done to you.

“What are you doing Rose?” asked a guard to which her head didn’t move as she looked at you. She knew better than to react to anything anyone said, if for no other reason than to not show a connection to things that could be used against her.

“What do you care?” she asked in a clearly different tone as she was previously speaking to you. It was more ruthless and directed.

“The dragon his Lord Scar’s, not yours. It looks to me like you are trying to make friends with it.” He shot back.

“How I train him is none of your business you pathetic man. However, I do believe he is getting hungry and Lord Scar gave me full reign on who to feed to his new favorite pet, guards included.” She sent back with a glare that indicated that she was considering him as the first candidate.

“Now just hold on there Rose. I didn’t mean anything by it. Was just worried someone else would report you was all.” he stuttered in clear fright as he rushed to make up a believable excuse then equally rushed out of sight.

“Well my little Max. It looks like that while there are some downsides that there are some upsides as well.” Rose said to which you licked her face as she nuzzled you back in a fashion that solidified her standing as your new mother, in your eyes anyway. You took in her scent and everything about her so that you would never be confused. You knew she wasn’t a dragon so you had to make sure that you never mistook her for another human by mistake.
115.title: Prize.

1151.content:
You were moved shortly after arriving into a large and bare room that was inside Lord Scar’s castle. He wanted a prize so he insisted on you being something both fierce and house trained. That and he had to keep his prize a secret from the prying eyes of outsiders and more importantly other dragons. The room was huge with a thousand square feet of dirt ground and was furnished with trees and some other things to make an eventually full grown dragon feel at home. The habitat was self sufficient in that way and the sun that fed the plants also helped you. Even if it was a magically made sun it still helped. Rose was there constantly as she was in charge of you and everything you did. At first you were curious on why she fed you human meat every day but as your mother you didn’t complain and it was rather delicious. After two weeks you were near a large dog size and far less skittish than before.

“So, how is my prize doing today?” asked Lord Scar as he came in for the first time since he kicked you against the wall. You growled at him and was ready to pounce but as soon as Rose pointed down you sat straight up as if nothing was wrong. One of the ‘tricks’ she taught you to control your behavior. She rewarded you with a pat on the head. “He seems to like you more than his master.” He accused.

“Only for the moments my lord. I believe he has imprinted me as his mother and you as his father. Dragon father figures tend to be more aggressive and so his instincts are guiding his actions. I do believe that this is an excellent starting point to establish an effective base for ensure his obedience. The love of a mother and the rule of a father, my lord.” She reported, sensing that he was close to replacing her so he would higher on your list.

“Well that is… interesting my Rose. I was beginning to feel that he would take your orders over mine?” he asked but more as a warning.

“Of course not my lord.” Rose replied with a bow.

“Good, then he won’t mind a treat from his master.” He said as he snapped his fingers to which a young man was brought out. He was naked, beat up, and scared from torture. His walk was barely anything more than a husk’s walk with nothing on the inside as he walked forward then stopped to a guard’s prod then waited. “Well, eat.” He commanded as he looked at the dragon then at Rose, again with not a very good look.

“In order to ensure obedience he only eats on command my lord.” She stated then whispered the command into his ear. At this point you could understand her quite a bit and she knew it. His eyes sparkled at the idea and information as she gave you a reluctant wink to tell you to do what he said. While it was true that she had a specific word to tell you to feed, in order to ensure you ate what she was providing and not those that brought in your… meals, but you didn’t need it as you followed what she said without question. This wouldn’t be the first human you had torn apart and you both new it wouldn’t be your last.

“What a brilliant idea my fair Rose. FEED!” he commanded and with Rose’s previous instinctive wink and your overhearing and comprehension of the situation, you immediately sprung toward your new meal and tackled him to the ground. You were by no means as ruthless as it looked and didn’t enjoy making your meals suffer so you latched onto his throat while still in the air and tore it out. You knew the impulsive man wanted a show so you put one on for him as you ripped and tore your feast up, devouring it bones and all. After about 15 minutes of him being memorized by this you trotted over to a small water source and dragon, cleaning your mouth out of blood as well as your jaws, knowing that Rose wouldn’t go near them if they were still covered. You sat in a similar position as before as you licked your chops and waited for Rose or… him for their next command. Usually when you ate she comforted you and soothed your belly with a rub but you knew that would have to wait while… HE was here. “I’ve never seen something so beautiful in my life. Rose, keep up the good work.” He said as he rushed out of the room and you could smell the distinctive scent of arousal from him, which almost infuriated you.

“I’m sorry Max.” Rose said after the doors were shut and she was able to come to you. She said this after every human meal.

You didn’t mind eating humans but you did if she had a problem with it. However, you knew by this point that she was bound by something and how you acted. But you already made up your mind. If that fat bastard ever told you to eat her. You would first only do so if she told you, and if she didn’t… oh how you would be gorged on 400 lbs of fat. You would defiantly kill him before her and, if you had a choice, before anyone else. Despite her words he was not your father but knew what she meant and your roll in her safety. You nuzzled her face a little and whined to her tears then lightly licked them of her face before they got too far. She smiled at the soft muscle against her face. She knew it was the same one that just lapped up a man’s blood and reseeded behind the same set of teeth that took a man’s life and consumed him. But she completely trusted you and as your mother the feeling was mutual.

“I love you my little Max” came her typical saying as she hugged your neck and body to which you draped your head down and across to hug her back. You wondered if she would still call you that when you got even bigger. “Ok, let’s get that belly of yours comfortable.” She suggested and you licked her as she got up and trotted over to a soft spot far away from your usual feeding spot. This place was thick and soft with moss and dirt but not enough dirt showing to dirty her clothes or persona. It was just a soft and gentle place where she could rub your stomach and encourage the digestion process. This usually continued until you were in a deep sleep and probably well after but as you were asleep you could say for sure.
1151.title: 2 week status report.

11511.content:
As months went by you both were delighted to find that Lord Scar didn’t visit more than one more time do to his busy and probably illegal business schedule. However your growth didn’t stop and in 3 months time you were a little larger than a horse. As far as your body was concerned and your head toward over Rose at near 10 feet tall and a tail that was proportionally long for a dragon of that size. However she still called your ‘my little Max’, similar to how she would her own child, which as far as you were concerned you were her child. By now she knew you could fully understand her and she knew you could probably learn to speak. However she needed excuses to tell Lord Scar when he came why she needed more time with you. Either way you were stuck with normal dragon type grunting, growling, snarling, and other body motions to communicate.

“I know you want to fly but I don’t think he’ll let his prized pet out.” Rose said as she pat you on the neck. You had been flexing your wings then flapping them strong enough to knock her over at times in hopes of being able to fly. But she was right and both of you knew it. There was no way he would let you out and he would probably discipline you both if he did and you didn’t know how to fly. Luckily you got a few hours in when you were smaller but you still longed to go soaring in the sky that you only saw maybe twice in your life.

You sighed and placed your head back on her lap as she leaned against your body. Lord Scar had ordered he to live with you and pretty much be with you 24/7 so she was. Not that it was a strain on either of you besides getting out for her. Unlike you, she could go outside and get a breath of fresh air. She also had other related tasked to do but this position was the one you two used the most to fall asleep. Your head was like a blanket while your body kept her warm and hidden from the occasional guard that came through your room. While they may have tried and failed a few times to take advantage of her before, they were nowhere near as stupid to do so while you were with her and pretty much on top of her already but not in the fashion they wanted.

“I know, I know. Max, someday we’ll be out of this place and you’ll never have to see or hear your master again. Heck, don’t tell him this but he is one guy I wouldn’t mind you taking a bite of on our way out.” She almost whispered to you to which you huffed an affirmative as she stroked your muzzle. No one except you would be able to tell that she wanted out that badly. Well, no one actually liked Lord Scar but they liked money more than their desire to be free and they got a lot of money for staying around him. But once you were in his dept you never got out. “You know Max, as much as I hate the idea of you eating people, I don’t think I’ll ever get sick of this sound.” She said as she leaned her head back on your body to which she could hear your stomach gurgle with the day’s contents digesting away inside.

You knew she liked it and she knew that you knew. She also knew that was why you sometimes took the extra effort to swallow things whole. For one there was less cleanup and for another they tended to last longer if they were still alive and wiggling around.
11511.title: Getting bigger.

choices: Tricks you play can be a little rough, accidentally.
115111.content:
Rose quickly got up and you knew what that meant. The only time she moved that fast in relation to a noise was when Lord Scar was coming in or calling. She was already on thin enough ice the way it was and she was the more secure people in his employ. You also got up and ducked into the growing brush that was near to the feeding area as she ran over to the edge and stood waiting the heavy, thick, and steal door to open. It was quite obvious when Lord Scar came in as he used this large door to further raise his status in even his entrance to a room. The guards and others used the normal doors. Thankfully the large door took a few minutes to open completely and allow entry. So you and Rose had a few minutes to get ready for him. You hardly had to do much except be unseen or awaiting his arrival. She on the other hand had to ready and looking to attractive for him to get rid of. This also made her exercise and keep her body in top shape. She had more than seen what happens to women like her who lost their attractiveness, they get fed to you or worse.

“Ah, my dearest Rose.” Said the bald and intrusive, not to mention disgusting, man. He was walking in with a crowd of almost 15 people at his heel. They still looked like they were walking on egg shells but they also had one more thing in common, that was their attire. They all looked just like him in stature and dress. Most weren’t as physically disgusting as he was but were equally or more sadistic and callous looking.

“So, My Lord, where is this prize you boasted about?” Asked one of the more stuffed up looking humans following him.

“That is a good question.” Lord Scar said and looked his usual offended look to Rose to which you knew to mean she only had a few seconds to explain herself and compliment him to regain his waning and temperamental favor.

“My Lord. He is practicing his latest accomplishment. He has been practicing his stalking. He has become accustomed to training to his meal’s expense and is quite accomplished in taking them down either without them knowing or scaring them almost to death. He has also been accustomed to your most generous gifts so he is excited for such things but wishes to impress you. He will do as you command, as always.” She replied with a bow and a presentation that both complimented him, and worked on his bloated and sadistic imagination. It also told you that you were to follow his orders. You did were already an expert at stalking. But you understood that her saying it like she did made it sound like she trained you to this extent and thereby further put value on her position and status.

“That is what I like to hear my dearest Rose.” He said, as he was next to her now and grabbed her but with a firm squeeze then moved on as if he wasn’t really concentrated on her but still indulged in his right to sexually harass her. Once again she put on a sensually appeasing face to keep his mind working. For such a profitable business man, his mind wasn’t that hard for her to control. “Miss reporter. You seemed to be the most skeptical about my claim to have a dragon at my command. Why don’t you walk with Rose here and see for yourself. You will be a most excellent gift.”

“I suppose so.” The woman said as she stuck her nose up to much for her to see Lord Scar whisper something in Rose’s ear as he grasped her breast in a one armed and sideways hug. You could hear Rose’s heartbeat sink but her expression showed the opposite as she seemed delighted, on the outside, to what he suggested.

“Right this way Ma’am.” Rose said as she gestured for her to follow her to your normal feeding spot. It was a good thing that she kept it clean, as the sight of fountains of blood would’ve gave it away. “If you wait right here, he will be around to… greet you in a moment.” Rose finished then walked to join Lord Scar, fully knowing that another round of groping would ensue but more importantly it gave you an understanding what was going to happen. The woman was smack in the middle of your feeding area.

“FEED!” Lord Scar commanded but nothing happened. To which he squeezed the breast he was holding a little harder than was necessary in his sudden anger to why his ‘prize’ wasn’t doing as commanded.

“I see, so this is the mighty dragon you so prized in.” Said the reporter as she laughed at him that only got him to squeeze harder.

“Explain this at once.” He whispered so that is guests didn’t think he was not in control.

“Ssh… He has learned that you like a show My Lord, so he is giving you one. He only wishes to impress you as his master.” She said in a teasing tone that enticed him back to his normal state and to lighten his grip on her now probably bruised or at the very least sore breast. But she wisely didn’t complain about it or even do so much as a wince. He began to smile as he saw you stalk out of the bushes in her blind spot as she looked back at the crowd of people. They, unlike the ignorant reporter, knew not to anger or even slightly insult Lord Scar. If he didn’t really have a dragon than he sure as hell had a few lions or other ravenous beasts to feed them to. But now they looked on as you crept so silently that the arrogant and ignorant reporter was boasting about her safety and the lack of dragon despite you gaining on her form. She continued to do so as you got closer and closer. You were making sure that you were moving in a way they, and more specifically Lord Scar, would greatly enjoy and probably whack of later about.

“I come here to report on this prize of Lord Scar’s collection and I have yet to see anything of…” She continued but was stopped as some of your drool dripped on her shoulder from your now open mouth above and slightly behind her. She looked at the substance and draped a finger through it then saw another drip and followed the saliva string up and back as your jaws were had just stretched to their maximum to accept her. At the peak of the moment/show you thrust your jaws down just as she let out a ear splitting scream you knew he loved before her head and shoulders were lodged in your jaws up to her upper chest so her arms couldn’t do much.

Showing your teeth as your sank only slightly so some of her blood was tinting the otherwise bland taste of her clothes. But you didn’t puncture too much as to even come close to major harm. Her scream could be heard as you snapped at her form and swallowed in a well practice motion. They all watched as the struggling lower body was forced up into the air and down your throat with blood barely but present on your teeth at times until she was sliding into your gut and with your licking your chops to Lord Scar’s delight.

“I expected it to be more… painful.” Lord Scar said out loud.

“That is his other gift to you My Lord.” Rose said as she motioned for you to come over as she told you to expose your slightly distorted stomach. “Can you see and hear it My Lord?”

“Ahh! Get me out of here. It’s burning and I can’t move. Please, someone help!” came the sound of the woman from the inside projecting to the outside as you leaked some stomach acid in, just enough to get her moving and audible. You weren’t about to have a sensation that would normally last a few hours be done in a few minutes.

“Is he…?” Lord Scar asked with more excitement than you had ever seen on him.

“Yes, My Lord. He is slowly digesting her. He has found it particularly pleasing to feel his meals wiggle while fighting a fruitless battle to survive his digestive system. It usually lasts at least a few hours. Sometimes he can get them fighting and pleading for a whole day before his stomach acids render them unconscious from the intense pain they feel. Even at that point they can still feel it as his stomach digests them, Very Slowly.” She said, again in a way that would entice him and it looked like it worked.

“Once again, my dear Rose, you’ve outdone yourself.” He complimented then went right next your wiggling stomach. “You hear that? You are going to be in immense pain until my pet’s stomach is done with you… have fun in hell.”

With that he stayed around for little bit then left satisfied with you and Rose. Rose accompanied you to your bed and laid against your stomach as it digested but while she like the sounds of digestion, she didn’t like her sounds of agony.

“Can you please end it so we can get some sleep?” she asked.

“What? No!” came a voice as she screamed in pain but only for a second as you digest her to the point of unconsciousness then allowed your stomach noises to lull you both asleep.
115111.title: Showing you off.

choices: She accepts and is civil about it.
She hates both of you and you just finish it quickly.
1151111.content:
“Ok, this is going to be a secret, you understand?” Rose asked to which you nodded. She was strangely serious for a moment and you always obeyed her as your Mother. “I know you can hear and understand me, but I am quite frankly tired of one way conversations. So, I am going to teach you to speak. But you can only speak to me. If Lord Scar even assumes I’ve been doing this than he will force feed me to you himself.”

This got you to take this more seriously. Yes you wanted to learn to speak. But not if it made your Mother lose her life. Even worse, you knew Lord Scar had ways of forcing you to do things. You would be damned before you would put your Mother in danger like that so you concentrated hard for a few weeks. You soon found that while you knew the language, speaking it was not as easy as you thought it would be. Your deceptively long tongue got in the way or your normal dragon speech would say things instead of the human speech. On top of that you were still growing. Not much but now you were near elephant size, well your torso was at least. It was kind of pointless to measure your tail, neck and head as they would constantly change. But now you could nearly fit a whole human inside your mouth. Now just the legs were sticking out just above the knees. With your growing vocabulary of verbal words you were able to speak with your Mother but didn’t know that word for a while. It was necessary but it did come up eventually and it took a while to figure out the right usage. But now you knew the human word to go with the status Rose had over you. You didn’t speak very loud to avoid any listening people.

“Max, lunch time.” Rose called as she brought in two humans tied together with rope. She had long been desensitized to both you eating people and your preferences in such. You didn’t like clothes so she had them prepared without them as much as she could. At first she’d blush of look away from a guy’s… tools or a woman’s parts for a bunch of reasons. But now she was just used to it. That and your growing body needed more food which meant more people to be eaten. Most of them were almost brain dead already from being in a prison or torture room. But this time it looked like both had their minds very much intact. As the guards secured the rope to the waist high pole in your main feeding area you saw them both. One was a young woman, perhaps one that had angered Lord Scar or wasn’t useful to him anymore. The other looked to be a well built but sadistic looking man. But the one thing they both had in common other than being nude as their fear of their situation.

“What the hell. What did I do to deserve this?” asked the man as he looked into the relatively fake jungle around him for his future death.

“You must’ve done something.” Rose said. While she didn’t get to know your food she wasn’t heartless either. She more than made an attempt to save them any pain or make their last moments at least partially pleasing.

“What do you know about it?” He snapped at her viciously.

“I know that it takes a lot of but kissing and work to keep my living and useful status. Lord Scar isn’t one to tolerate anything less. Heck, even more than useful people to him have been fed to his pet here. Now that I’ve answered you question I would strongly suggest you not insult me again. Max, the dragon, doesn’t like it very much.” Rose responded.

“What should I care? I’m going to the same place no matter what I do. Might as well end it on my terms you selfish, slutty, kiss ass, piece of…” he continued for a while till Rose gave up and sat on a log waiting for you to arrive. She knew you were stalking them and would usually eat the girl first. You didn’t want their last moments being plunged into a soup of blood and guts as they digested away in your stomach. But when someone was like this, you would rid the area of such talk quickly.

You crept as close as you could to them and waited for the man’s back to turn before rushing out and slashed the rope that held them. This got the man to run right into your snout. He didn’t notice until your snout started rumbling as his hands pushed against it to get back firmly to his feet. The rumble was you growling at him. He backed away slowly from you but you stalked him into the woods until he tripped and tried to run. But you caught him by the foot in your jaws. He yelled and cursed as you drug him toward you. Then you stood up and flicked him up so he was airborne and heading straight for your jaws. Your aim was perfect as he was sent to your gut almost before you could snap your jaws closed. With a lick of your chops you turned to the girl, who had her head buried in her hands as she coward on the ground. Perhaps hopping that if she couldn’t see you than you wouldn’t be able to find her. You started the digestion so the man was receiving a painful punishment for ripping on your Mother like that. But luckily the painful exclamations didn’t make it out of your thicker stomach walls for others to hear, unless they put their ear to it. You slowly and quietly moved toward the other and got a look from your Mother. You knew it as a ‘be nice’ look. You were intending to anyway but either way it got you to nuzzle the young woman in the back like a dog might with an immobile plaything or hand that would preferred be petting him.

“GO AWAY!” screamed the girl. The sudden words and volume got you to cringe back. Here you were trying to be nice to her and she was just screaming at you. Sometimes humans made no sense to you.

“No that’s not very nice young lady. I do believe Max is trying to be nice. If he doesn’t eat you than not only does he get punished but I do as well and you get eaten by an angry and starving lion or something like that. At least he is giving you a more pleasant option.” Rose defended for you. You knew how to speak well enough by this point but not enough to comfort a distraught young woman.
1151111.title: Speaking lessons.

choices: Bigger, Rose is sealed in and a new feeding system is created.
11511111.content:
The young woman wept for a while before hazarding a look up. She stared at your new position behind your Mother and your head down near the log so she could lovingly pet your head while they waited. She was still shivering at the sight of you and/or her relation to you.

"Take as much time as you need," your Mother said soothingly. "Lord Scar won't be back from his trip until the full moon and any guards know better than to bother him during feeding time."

"I... I didn't do anything. C-Can't you talk to... t-them?" she asked.

"I'm sorry my dear. I've tried before. I even suggested that someone be a week long meal. As grewsome as that sounds, Lord Scar still didn't agree to it. The most I can do is help this be as pleasant as possible for you." Rose answered to which the woman buried her head in her hands and tried to weep again, but was all out of tears, or so it seemed. "How about we change subjects and just talk for a little while?"

"O-ok, he won't try to rip me in half of something?" She agreed then asked.

"Only if you start being civil. You do know that dragons have minds even smarter than a human's right? He understands just fine. Lord Scar might have a blind eye towards it but we know what it means. Even if he can't talk in a way you can understand, yet, he can sure as hell understand us, right?" Rose asked you, to which you rumbled an affirmative then nuzzled her a little before soaking up her petting you again.

"Then, if it's ok, can I touch him? At least a while from the outside before I have to go inside?" she asked, still not moving from her terror ridden position as of yet.

"Sure, I think he would like that. He doesn't want to harm you. Even if he finds us delicious, he is far too kind to wish harm on someone as innocent as you. But we don't all get what we want. I'm guessing you know that better than most. We know it isn't fair, but it can be pleasant and even enjoyable, if you let us take care of you." Rose answered.

The woman thought about it for a while. Then finally forced herself to her feet to face the two of you.

"I suppose it is all the help I am going to get. If you... two, are being pleasant and thoughtful, than I should be as well." She concluded than made her first step toward you. The trip was agonizingly long, but eventually she was sitting on the same log but opposite side of your head. She rose her hand and touched you. It took some silent convincing before she moved her hand and started to pet you like Rose was. "He's so warm."

"That he is." Rose agreed with a smile. You took the innitiative and nuzzled into her hand and body a little. She froze when you moved, at first, but calmed as she realized what you were doing. Her body was also warm as she didn't have any clothes to get in the way of her skin or the scent that was teasing you. The two of them talked about meaningless girl stuff. Things that had no real meaning other than social interaction and keeping her mind off her impending fate. But that was interupted as your stomach growled a complaint at being empty once again. Both woman looked at it, at you, then at each other.

"I guess that is my call." The woman stated as she got up and stood in front of you. Rose got up and gave her a hug before stepping away slightly. She didn't need to worry about blood splatter when you were eating like this, or fighting. You gave a whine and nuzzled her hand again, as if asking for her to stay longer. This action seemed to bring a smile to her face, as if confirming that you didn't actually wanted to eat her despite her delightful taste, that Rose had explained to her indirectly in their conversation. "Awe, I'll miss you to. You be good and obey your Mother. And when the two of you finally do get out of here... make sure that fat tub of lard we call 'Master' gets a not nice visit to your belly. But don't you dare digest him into your body. I don't want to be stuck being a part of a wonderful dragon with the knowledge that he is to. ok?"

"I PROMISE" you said with a heavy dragon accent but not enough to not be understood.

"You have a wonderful voice." she complimented as your snout came up to her face to which you gave her a small emotional lick to her check. "Ok, take me before I loose my nerve and say something stupid."

"He'll make it as pleasurable as possible and not digest you till you can't feel it." Rose informed.

"Thank you." she replied with a smile to her then to you as you rose up more and she gazed up and into your opening jaws. "Wait, let me go in by my own power."

You had never eaten anyone like her before. They all at least needed you to seal the deal. They could never feed themselves to you. The fact that she was doing so without suicidal mind in play hit you with a large pang of guilt. You didn't even know what the emotion was at this point but you now HATED Lord Scar for this even more. But you couldn't let that take away from this Woman's final act of kindness and selflessness. So you lowered your head and reopened your jaws in front of her till they were sore at the gap she now looked in.

With a deep breath, the woman grabbed your top jaw and put her legs in first. She carefully swung and placed herself on your tongue, but her head and shoulders were still out of your mouth... or at least past your teeth. Your taste buds started to soak up her flavor and make you drool a little as she wiggled her tasty body on your tongue. You didn't dare move to taste her though. One wrong move and the part of her that was over your teeth could be shredded. When she stopped moving you started closing your jaws. You closed them just enough to make her snug and comfortable.

"His tongue is so soft, yet I have no doubt it could be unpleasant if he wanted it to. It makes his kind nature even more visible. Seeing my world through the jaws of a dragon. Call me crazy, but I can't think of a better way to go or a more pleasant last sight. I will forever be part of this magnicificent being. May both of you be free and at peace one day, for making me such in my last hours." The woman said then grabbed your teeth and pushed, sending her feet and calves into your throat and the rest of her body splashing onto your tongue just as your jaws shut and you started swallowing out of instinct. You couldn't help running your tongue around her as you pushed her back and let your throat take over. The last thing you felt of her in your mouth was her hugging your tongue before kissing it and letting your throat take the rest of her. But that wasn't the end of her. She worked on your stomach from the inside. It felt like she was giving it a massage from the inside. The feeling was different than the fighting you usually got. Maybe it was the emotion with this one, but this one felt better than the higher stimulation of a fighting meal. You would miss her and never forget that feeling... as well as your promise.
11511111.title: She accepts and is civil about it.

choices: They let Rose have an 'assistant'. Your family is growing.
115111111.content:
Of course you got bigger over the next year. By now, it took about 5 humans just to quell your appetite for a day. Sometimes, when Lord Scar couldn't afford to lose that many, he would send in a large animal in instead. This was appreciated, as it took the emotional edge off. But, for both your sake and your Mother, you acted like you didn't like the downgrade. That seamed to please Lord Scar. As if feeding you humans was now a treat instead of a main course. They stopped measuring you after you ate one of the servants that was overly rude and... touchy to Mother. But all they needed to know was that you were getting VERY big. Instead of a human just barely fitting in your jaws, now a full sized cow was the new measure. Your body was large enough to barely fit through the doors, if they ever were to let you out. Because of this, and a few unschedualed meals on your end that took some of Lord Scar's favorite servants, they made a new form of feeding method.

First; your mother, Rose, was sealed in the room with you. Lord Scar thought it was a fitting punishment and a viable incentive to help her teach HIS pet better control over his urges. On the surface she was shocked and appologetic, but underneath and when alone with you she couldn't be happier. Sure she missed getting out into the fresh air, but she could handle it if you were there, and you had a similar feeling about her. The second part was more of a show now. They added a section above you with a small platform above your reach, or what they thought was your reach, and an opening in the wall. This opening had a plank of sorts that went out a few feet and was on a hinge. This is what they used to feed you now. It was just big enough to hold an elephant if needed. For they made it in the thought that you would need such large prey eventually. But the primary purpose was so that Lord Scar could hold events to watch you eat and feed his... unagreeable buisness partners to you as examples. As your head reached about 100 feet at this point, the plank was set to 300 feet, in the expectation that you would be growing, the cieling, with this new addition, being at 400 feet high. That was, you came to see, your way out. If they kept carving into the ceiling like that, eventually you could blast it open with your secret flame breath and escape. But it was still too thick, currently at least.

Finally, you and your Mother kept all your growing skills a secret; your growing speach, flame breath, convertable tail, intellegent mind, and most importantly your desire to escape with your Mother. As for the humans you were fed when Lord Scar wasn't there. You had to catch them in your jaws as they dropped. Sometimes you used the momentum to just gulp them down. If they were bad you could chew them apart. If they were good, you waited till you were alone with Mother and let them out for a while then ate them like the girl before, as comfortable and nicely as possible. But if you didn't catch them, they died from the fall. Another one of Lord Scar's ways of controlling HOW you ate. But, thankfully, he had much else to do and was only 'observing' once every month at best. Unless on holiday, then he was there every minute of every day, sometimes overstuffing you with victims and... satisfying himself as you ate. This made you hate him even more. Getting off on the innocent screams and terror of young people. You counted the days until you would make him suffer in your gut. At this point, your Mother totally agreed with it. In fact she suggested you keep him alive for a year in your gut, digesting him partially, healing him painfully, then repeating the process. But that was beyond the point right now. It looked like it was feeding time, and it was your 'special' meals that Lord Scar was giving to you.

"Please, Lord Scar, I will do better. I can make you more money than you could dream of. I will be of use to you, I know it!" pleeded an old man that you had seen in his group of observers from time to time. He was stripped of his clothes except his small undergarments. Lord Scar made the women be completely naked, for obvious reasons, but the men had a small cloth covering their privates. He had no desire to see a males... anatomy, but the blood from visible wounds he thoroughly enjoyed. Your mother tapped you on the leg. You looked at her and she gave a throat slash signal. That meant it was ok to get a little messy. She only did this with members she knew that were 'rotten'. Then she went off to a seating area she made, under the cover of some fake trees, so you knew where she was and didn't acctidentally harm her as you fed.

"Oh, I have no doubt about that. You served me well enough over the years. But, you committed the one crime that I will not forgive, ever. You stole my money!" Lord Scar stated then pushed the man out onto the plank. The man stopped before he fell off and looked down for a second to see you circling below him, looking up, licking your chops, then circling again. It was a show you put on for them, so they were happy with Mother teaching it to you. Particularly when HE fed you. As if he was your favorite. The man snapped his attention back to Lord Scar.

"I only gave that coin to the poor lad to improve your image in that sector. If you appear to give to the poor in that area, they will sell you their soul for more, like an addict would, just for one more. It would win you their support! Please, I have so much more planned to help grow your empire. Soon, the whole country will be yours, and you won't even have to life a finger. They will abandon on their own, to come where the money is." He explained quickly. He was good. He knew, like everyone else, that the one thing he loved more than his own pleasure and superority was MONEY. He played his emotions like a harp and it looked like he was considering it. But then you saw a beautiful young lady approached and hugged into his arm seductively. He turned and grabbed her and forcably started to make out with her, shameless in any advance he pleased before seperating.

"I'm afraid my dearest here has a better... tongue, than you do." He joked to which she laughed with him. Her hair was a mess at this point and her clothes torn, showing one of her breasts that he had been manhandling. "Will you do the honors dear. Then we can watch as my loyal pet feasts. That would be a good start to our time together would it not?"

"With pleasure, my Lord." She responded as she teased the man on the plank with her finger over the button. He looked down again, out of fear of what was to come, to see you pause than look up, visibly drooling for him, growling for your meal. Again, all for show, but he didn't know that. As he looked back to her pleadingly she seamed to climax as she pushed the button.

"NO!!!" screamed the man as the plank fell and he was falling toward you.

With a will practiced move, you crouched then lunged as soon as he was in range, but not jumped. You didn't need them knowing you COULD reach the platform, if you wanted. With this lunge you snapped your jaws shut partially as you caught him with his head and one arm outside. Your teeth squewered him in well aimed places to maximize the blood splatter for HIS entertainment. You flicked him up once, as if to get a better grip. This time he was screaming in pain. You saw Lord Scar's eyes widen with this new trick, then your jaws snapped shut with the man inside. You made a few chewing motiongs with your lips raised so he could hear the man in your jaws squeal before swallowed him in segments. You looked up, as if asking for more, but only saw the raised legs of the woman beyong the observing barricade. If you didn't have any hold on your emotions, you would've leapt up and ate them both. But your time was not yet there. There was still much to wait for, and you trusted your mother to decide when the right time was. But it didn't make it any easier for you. Despite your love of the taste, you didn't like the thought of eating human innocents, sometimes children on occasion, just for his sadistic pleasure. Now that you thought on it, one year of torture in your belly would be a gift compared to what you wanted to do to him. But that was later and this was now.
115111111.title: Bigger, Rose is sealed in and a new feeding sys...

choices: You are Max, who is black like his Dark Hunter brethren.
You are Warden, a female, green, eastern dragon.
You are Opal, a prismatic blue dragon, who can't decide on a gender.
I don't like these dragons! Gimmie moar!
I don't like this good human! Make another!
12.content:
Moments after your rather clumsy landing, your miraculous instincts kicked in once again. Having sensed the presense of a human, as there was, in fact, a human man nearing you at that moment, you instinctually shifted back into into a form that resembled a human.
The man hailed from a rare, self-sufficient kingdom that managed to stave off dragons, yet he also had an even rarer combination of curiosity, wisdom, and kindness. He, upon seeing what resembled an injured infant, dropped the supplies that he was carrying and rushed over to you. He gently picked up your unconscious and wounded body, and began examining you, too see how poor of a condition you were in, and whether you could be saved from your grievous wounds. It was to his great surprise, however, that upon ovening your eyelids and studying your eyes closely, that he gleamed a hint of your draconic nature in then. Being a kind man, albiet startled, he knew that he couldn't leave you, this strange human-like non-human, so he performed the only other option that he had: taking you with him.

Many years later, you were living with your father, just as you had always been. The kind man that had found you took you in, as his own. You had lived with him, worked with him, trained with him, and spent your life with him. He had kept no secrets from you, and you remained knowledgeable about how you were found, your abities, and much more, though some of this was due to the man's own interest in you. He had long held you as the most important part of his life, and longed for every moment that he spent teaching both himself and you about, well, you.
Together you learned the extent of your abilities, and which abilities you were capable of using. Having the great jumble of knowledge that you did, there were many times that you attempted to use something far too powerful for you to handle. As such, you were left with relearning almost everything that you couldn't perform instinctually or easily. This may have been a good thing, as a younger, more impulsive you may just have attempted to take over the world, and easily succeded, had you have had full access to your potential.
One of the powers that you both were most facinated with, however, was your ability to change form. You found that you could even change bits of your appearance, on occasion, should you attempt enough. Eventually, you perfected your draconic form to just how you liked it:
12.title: You are found by a good human.

choices: Bow, check. Arrows, check. Giant dragon, check.
SIR dragon. It isn't a pun, like prize, jing, or cuss, but it could work.
123.content:
Eventually, after a long series of slight changes throughout your life, you finally reached a form that you found pleasing to the eye. You have great, for your young size of 20 feet, webbed wings that are quite normal for a western dragon, such as yourself. Your many, shining scales reflect a great many colors, but the pigment that radiates most brilliantly is a shade of blue, not unlike the stone of your namesake.
Your gender, however, is something that you have had a much more difficult time deciding on, compared to the appearance that you have your heart set on. You've never had any preference for one or the other, and have found switching between the two much easier than something like changing the color of the scales all over your body. "Besides," you figure, "I'm still quite young, for a dragon. Why should I settle for one gender now, when I might desperately wish for the other later?"

Aside from your struggle to achieve asthetic perfection, you have found yourself remaining in a male human form. You stay male, as it was the gender your father discovered you in, and consistant switching between the two would be both disconcerning as well as confusing. Besides, when you do become female, it allows for anonymity, which in turn allows you to do several other amusing things.
Genders aside, you have found yourself remaining in your human form, as you happen to reside in a kingdom that has remained seperate from dragons. As such, one of the peasants there suddenly becoming a dragon would be much more than simply a surprise. You would likely find yourself under attack from the same guards that are meant to protect the peasantry. At one point, the fear of this occuring became one of your predominant thoughts. You went around without looking anyone in the eye, out of the fear that someone might notice the slight difference in your pupils that distinguishes you from the rest of humanity. It wasn't long, however, before you realised that it would take not only the knowledge of this difference existing, but actual, lengthy study of your eyes to even catch a hint of your species. As such, your fears were quelled.

After your fears about your species and the knowledge that came with it faded, you quickly found yourself wondering what you were to do with your excess of wisdom. You found yourself leaning between a simple learning, and mastering, of hunting - something that your dragon-self could partake in - the chivalrous actions of swordplay - something that would open paths to gallantry and heroism - and the vast world of magic - the likes of which composes a significant portion of your knowledge.
All three paths held drawbacks, however. Should you decide to hunt, you held the chance of poaching the wrong beasts and getting caught as a dragon. Should you take up a sword, you may find yourself too weak to even hold it properly. Should you fancy yourself a magician, you run the risks of being an outcast, and accidentaly casting spells that you know of but cannot handle. It was a decision that you had to think long and hard on.
123.title: You are Opal!

choices: You found that you could learn through practice much quicker!
You find a mentor who is indeed willing to not notice a few things.
You find yourself apprenticed to one of your king's own advisers.
1233.content:
By "long and hard" you had evidently meant only a few moments of thinking. With the vast majority of the knowledge contained within your mind having it's roots in the infinitely more vast field that is the magical arts, it was more of a wonder that you hadn't chosen to pursue said field to a much greater extent much earlier. Had you chosen to just ignore all of the knowledge that you had been born with, it would have probably driven you crazy with both temptation and curiosity.
Fortunately for you, however, is that you had just chosen to invest time in furthering your magical skills. With already having inevitably mastered a few explicitly simple spells during your youth, along with the inherent magical nature of your species, you were already well along on your way to becoming a magician. A rookie, apprentice magician, but a magician none-the-less.

So, the true begining of your story unfolds. Your very early youth, for a dragon, while surely interesting to experience, would seem extremely uneventful and perhaps even boring to one simply perceiving it. Or, at the very least, it would be considered such compared to the quickly arriving next chapter of your life.

As such, you have sought after a leave, albiet possibly temporary, from your father(The likes of which probably ought to be refered to by his name, Albrom.) and his tidy, quiet living. You began a search within your kingdom(The likes of which probably ought to be refered to by its name, Yvale.) for a mentor both capable and willing to teach you what you wanted to know, yet not quite capable of discrening the truth behind yourself. Or, perhaps simply willing to overlook it "accidentaly."
Your search came to a conclusion after finding what wasn't quite what you were looking for.
1233.title: Yer a wizerd, draggy!

12333.content:
Entering your father's, Albrom's, room, you find yourself filled with great purpose. Today, you intend to make use of your potential and find yourself a proper mentor. You have known magic your entire life and have even bothered to spend the time to gain control over a few minor spells, but the knowledge you hold tells you that you are capable of so much more. With this in your mind, you grasp the shoulder of the only soul who, thus far, has truly cared about and for you.

The middle-aged man with the appearance and demeanor of someone much older and wiser awoke with a start. Abruptly sitting up in bed, his arm immediately latches onto yours, holding tightly, as his eyes search the room frantically. After a short moment, the terror leaves his deep, blue eyes, and his grip loosens. He clasps your hand with his own free one, he exhales in a long sigh, calming himself. You assume that he had awoken from yet another occurance of a particularly common nightmare of his, in which he gets skewered by some sharp projectile, be it a spear or a thrown dagger. Whichever of these it might be, you figure that it was to your advantage that you had taken him out of said particularly stressful situation, given what you were about to tell him.

You found this unecessary, however, as his face seems to even light up when you confide in your goal of furthering yourself in wizardry. He simply retorts, "We were born with a brain in each of our heads instead of rocks for a reason. It just so happens that you've gotten stuck with an exceptional one, and it is far past time that you use it."
His words struck you hard, and almost like being stricken in the chest literally, you found yourself struggling to breathe. With liquid now streaming down your face, you gave your father-figure a hug to trump all hugs, thanking him. Soon, you clad yourself in travel gear rather than tears, and found yourself traveling with a strange, new longing for the home you had not yet left. With a few crucial belongings in tow, you left your long time residence, knowing that it would be a great day indeed when you made your return.
12333.title: It's like homecoming, but in reverse.

choices: Surprise! More than one of them requested you.
A specific advisor wishes for your presence.
123331.content:
Immediately after embarking on your journey, you quickly set about bringing it to an end. You wanted to be able to spend your time training and learning, not looking for someone to train and teach you. As such, you began displaying what skill you did have in performance-like situations. You helped a pet out of a tree in a fanciful display of levitation, with a few harmless shimmers and sparks added in. When asked to light a small fire, you lit a huge, yet contained, one without any fuel. You certainly attracted quite a bit of attention, and for a while you considered hosting an actual show to entertain folks, while also bringing in some revenue to buy your way into an apprenticeship. You decided against this, however, as you were afraid that people would shift from thinking you as an impressive rookie, to a shallow conjuror of cheap tricks. Heck, you were already running a significant risk of that with what you were already doing, and began having second thoughts about luring invitations to yourself rather than seeking out a mentor. You figured that even if you managed to attract some wizard, he might only wish for you to entertain him.

These fears proved to be at least partially for naught. Apparently, you managed to impress the right person at the right time, as within a month of your partial-performances a courier addressed you, with a message directly from the royal court. It instructed you to show up with rather oddly specufic directions as to when and where, down to the second and inch, for an apprenticeship. While said instructions were slightly discomforting, more-so than this was the idea of who exactly was summoning you, as the message stated that it was from simply the royal palace.

Now, what you, and just about everyone else, knows about the palace is that it is ruled by the fledgling king Stephen the First. Unlike most arrogant kings of this age, Stephen understood his newness and thus hired the three men that he considered wisest for him to consult with. Them actually being the wisest is something much debated over, however, as the three are quite different from what most people would consider wise, atleast from the rumors about them. The disconcerning part about this situation was that all three were dabblers in magic, and the chances are that one of them requested your presense.

The first of the three is likely the only one that could be considered wise, due to his age, though it would seem that he never acts like it. Merlan(No relation to any wizards of legend) seems to be quite hot-headed, even going so far as insulting his employer during their frequent arguments. Outwardly, he would generally seem to actually be quite wise, judging from how he positions himself, and the discerning look that the goggles he alwats wears gives him only adds to that.
The second of the advisers goes by Jade O'Conner, and he dons a rather peculiar garb the likes of which's color matches the stone of his first name's namesake. His long, light brown hair in addition to his dress-like clothing has gotten him mistaken for a female on more than one occasion. Garments aside, Jade wouldn't be one that you would quite consider wise, due to his relatively young age. His remarkably expansive intelligence and his unsettlingly calm and cold manner of acting would contradict this, however.
The last advisor, Henry Pluss, has the direct opposite attitude, however. While Jade's calm aura cracks quite often to give way to the occasional quip or witticism, Henry's consistent smile is said to never leave his face. He is arguably the strangest of the group, bearing an attitude of joy in any situation. He also remains the youngest of the group, though one wouldn't guess it from his pure, white hair.

Which one of these wished for you, however, was something you would have to find out when you got there.
123331.title: Which wily wizard will win with wild wonders?

choices: Behind this link is an actual continuation. Click it.
1233312.content:
Even before arriving at the royal palace, you were already feeling significantly nervous, and for a few good reasons. First of all, even showing up placed you in at a great risk. A person with a dangerous secret really ought not to go placing themselves anywhere near the three wisest and most likely people to figure it out. But, it really wasn't like you had a choice in the matter, as denying a request from royalty would probably be even more dangerous fou you, given the amount of suspicion it would place on you.
Secondly, you were nervous about the exceptionally convoluted instructions that were delivered to you: "Arrive and stand six yards, two inches, nine centimeters, and three feet away from the southernmost rosebush along the castle at thirty-six seconds past noon a week from two days before this was written."
Lastly, you knew that you were well past the time that you were asked to arrive. It really wasn't your fault, given that you had gotten the letter three days after it was written while you were on the very outskirts of the kingdom. It was actually a feat within itself that you managed to make the trip back to the center of the kingdom in just over two days when it took one of the fastest messengers more than three. Never-the-less, you were late, and unsure of yourself and your situation.

To make matters worse, was what you realized upon your arrival. Upon reaching the castle's southern wall, you noticed a straight line of rosebushes, running east to west, directly alongside of it. As such, you felt forced to figure out exactly which bush was the southernmost, and where exactly you were supposed to stand away from it, making you even later than you already were. Eventually, you pick out a spot to stand, and simply wait there for a good while, all the while wondering whether you were in tne right spot, of if you just showed up too late.
After a but longer, you sigh in defeat, and walk over to the eastern side of the castle where the entrance is. The two guards in front of it, whom you had noticed glancing at you consistently while you were shuffling around earlier, glance at each other for a moment with smug grins on their faces before turning to you. You explain your situation to them, and even show them the letter that you had received, before they stand apart and permit your entry inside. You're certain that you heard quite a bit of snickering as you walked inside, though....
1233312.title: A "warm" welcome.

choices: Jade O'Conner, the creepily cold one.
Henry Pluze, the earnestly eccentric one.
12333121.content:
Quite upset about both your own failure, if you can call it that, and the attitude of the guards that you just passed, you enter into a rather long hallway in quite a grumpy huff. You hadn't even been in there long enough to finish the thought you had about where in the world you were supposed to head from where you were when you spot someone else in the hall. Someone who happened to be coming at a speedily pace directly towards you, with a facial expression, and a flushed face, that told you that he was in a mood even worse than yours. From a distance, you first questing why in the world he was wearing a robe as dirty as his was in a place like this before you realized that it simply looked that way normally, which, apperantly, makes it look normally filthy.
The next thing that grabs your attention, though snatched would be a better word, was the stave that the man was using as a walking stick. Without it, at the speed that he was moving, you figure that he would trip over himself. More interesting, however, is the staff itself. The thing appears to be intricately carved, even having a 'p' shape, handle-like decoration on each end. It's condition can only be described as poor, though. It has what appears to be dents covering it, as if from repeated bludgeoning. It seems to be so worn down that the center of it is actually visibly thinner than it's ends. There's even a clear crack running around it near it's center. It is quite an interesting object for anyone to be carrying around. So interesting, that it holds your attention enough for you to not notice the blue goggles and chest-long beard adorning the man's face until he's virtually in yours, less than a foot away and glaring at you.
He begins talking, in a loud, boisterous voice that only slightly matches his appearance. "I was asked to bring you here. I did. I was asked to prepare a welcome for you. I did. I was asked to perform it for you myself, and I set it up, and waited. I did, I did! But you, you just manage to mess it up." Before you can open your mouth and say more than a few startled stutters in your defense, he somehow manages to manuver himself to directly behind you, his hands on your back, shoving you down the hall into one of the rooms adjoined to it. He moves you into a position next to a window through which you can see a fairly pretty field. The one you were meandering about in earlier, you realize. Before you get to think about this further, the man, who you now, suddenly, notice bears the features of Merlan(no relation to any wizards of legend), raises one of his arms up to the window, pointing out of it. He says, then shouts, "See? SEE?!" all while shaking not just his finger, but his hand, as if for emphasis. As if on cue, a butterfly previously flitting around spontaneously bursts into flames. And sparks. Many sparks. It would actually be quite pretty, were it not coming from a combusted butterfly. It's then that you divert your attention to the grass, if only for the fire, due to the excess of sparks, that was starting there. You notice that a rather significant portion of the grass isn't grass. It's dirt, void of plants, forming a circle with a bit more missing within it in the shape of some foreign symbol. You groan inwardly, quite painfully, atleast to your pride. It's a glyph. Something you should have noticed much earlier. You snap out of this when you remember the fate of the butterfly, and begin to ponder the implications of this, You are snapped out of this, as well, by a flash of light behind you, and the sudden appearance of a previously white and clean, black, and soot covered, butterfly.

You sigh in relief, knowing that it wasn't your demise that was being prepared for, when Merlan sighs as well, apparently calming down, if only somewhat. He moves you, less forcefully, out of the room, and points down the hall before giving you one last shove. "The one who wants you is right down there. Go."
You, however, turn to face him. "But, which one is it? Jade O'Conner or Henry Pluss?"
"It's Pluze." he snaps back at you.
"Oh? Henry it is, then."
"No!" he snaps again, "His name is Pluze. With a 'z' and an 'e'. You did it wrong."
You reply, "But, isn't that how I pronounced it?"
He nods, before turning and walking away, leaning on his stick, again. "Yes, but not how you spelled it."
You tilt your head and squint your eyes in confusion before giving up, and turning towards the door down the hall, and towards the actual answer.
12333121.title: A "warm" welcome. (Pt. 2)

123331212.content:
Walking down the cooridor, you allow yourself to become immersed in thought. At first, you can't help but wonder who exactly really is behind this last door, especially since one of the possibilities has now been eliminated. Then, you are sudden onset with relief that Merlan(still no relation to any wizards of legend) was now, for certain, not the one you would be apprenticing for. Certainly, not dealing with his attitude was a plus, but there was more to it than that. The way you figure, Merlan put you in far more danger of being discovered. Him being as up close and personal as he is, as you just experienced, he was bound to notice some difference in you that gives you away eventually, and with his attitude, you would be turned in within minutes. Jade would likely find out as well, but you would probably hold too much interest to him for him to turn you in and let you be removed from where he could observe you.
As for Henry, you guess that he would be far too lackadaisical to find out in the first place. And, as it turns out, that will be put to the test. Having reached the hall, you open the doors and step inside the chamber beyond them, only to be standing face to face with the biggest smile you have ever seen. Er... someone wearing the biggest smile you have ever seen, that is. It really is the best grin that you have come across, and it seems to be simply plastered across his face, seemingly taking up far more room than it should. It even seems to push his other features out of the way, what with how his eyes are squinted, almost to the extent of being closed. Though, even with so little of his eyes available for you to see, even those seem to be smiling towards you.
Aside from his face, the young man is wearing what, at first, and second, glance, appears to be a robe several sizes too big, with it's sleeves going far past where his arms end. The rest of it, however, seems to be tailored to his body perfectly, with the bottom only just above dragging on the floor and the body of it snugly matching his body. It's color is, aside from a few lines and symbols for asthetic purposes, is completely white. The pale color of the robe pales in paleness in comparison with the man's pale hair. He wears his hair rather freely, with a few strands going this way and that, but it lays flat in a bowl cut, for the most part. Its color is almost indescribable, as it would seem it be past bleached, with the most pure, white color you had ever seen. At first, you ponder how he created such a dye, before realizing that it wasn't dyed at all, but was his natural hair color.

All of these thoughts are suddenly interupted when he turns and notices you, spreading his smile seemingly even larger, if that was posdible in the first place, before him practically yelling out to you, "Hiya! Nice ta meet 'cha!" You stand, still in the doorway, with your mouth slightly agape, surprised at Henry Pluze, despite the rumors preparing you for him. Before you get a chance to recover and say anything in response, he practically skips over to you before continuing, "I'm Henry! I'm glad to see that you've gotten here about on time and hopefully without any trouble. That is, assuming you are who I think you are. OOH! Or, if you're someone who killed the person that I think you are and stole their place! Nya ha! That sure would be an interesting turn of events."
You quickly manage to regain atleast a piece your composure upon being called an imposter and muster up a reply. "N-no, sir. I'm Opal, here responding to a letter that I received about a potential apprenticeship, and was told upon arriving that you were the one to see about that."
"Nya ha ha! You're right about that. I figured that I may as well get an apprentice, bucause why not? All of the cool wizards are doing it! And you, from what I've heard, are just good enough, and flashy enough, to fill the spot. Interested?" Upon asking this, his smile lessens for the first time, looking much more like a normal face, but still never leaving his.
Besides taking note of this, you immediately respond, "Certainly! Yes, please. Just tell me what I need to do."
His smile pops right back onto his face. "Great! And what you need is a weapon to channel your magic through properly." He turns around, rolls one of his rediculously long sleeves up to his shoulder, seemingly only so he can hold his arm up and wave a finger around while he explains. "Every half-decent wizard, or mage, or any spell-caster has something to channel through. Merlan uses his 'ultimate staff' as he calls it, while Jade has a preference for polearms and spears. Given your current build, you'll want a really bulky weapon, like say, a tree trunk! Or, atleast a thick quarterstaff. You see, given the fact that you're sure to grow, you'll be better off with something you can grow into than something you're comfortable with now. You wouldn't want to be waving around a toothpick once you get all bulky, would you? Heh heh."
You decide on
123331212.title: Easily excitable entropous entity emits eagerness.

choices: You're successful... though a bit too much so.
1233312122.content:
After consideration, you figure that Henry is right. As you intend to learn magic, you figure that it would be rather counterproductive to have to take time to learn how to adapt the stances that you 'remember' for several different kinds of weapons to your body, given the time it would take. No, it would be better to get one kind of weapon, and one you can grow into, especially given the large span of time that you'll have to grow, given the rather long life-span of dragons.
So, you follow Henry to a room with several weapons to choose from, while you're still thinking about which kind exactly you're going to choose. Given that it is right next to the gymnasium-like room that you were already in, it wasn't much of a walk. Henry throws the doors open, quite literally, as he sends them open forcefully with a blast of magic. Inside is an assortment of mostly organized weapons, with staves, bows, daggers, longswords, and shortswords all lined up on racks and shelves along and on the walls, respectively. The weapons not stored were just that, and remained littered upon the floor in an unorganized mess, though some appear to have even been shoved into a pile. It really takes away from the general feel of awe that the organized, ornate weapons would have given off, otherwise. Stepping inside, you begin shuffling through the room, careful not to injure yourself on the weapons on the floor.
