Their rational, after they voided your ninja and residence status which made you no more than their property, was that they didn’t want you spreading your “lies” and turning people to your side. They knew of your ability to absorb the sun so you weren’t given any food either. Technically speaking you didn’t need it but your body was at that point always hungry and weak, which might have been the intended purpose. There were some people that were more civil, mainly just Naruto, but even he set off a few paper bombs for varying reasons. You slowly collected intel on a portal jutsu as you moved around as a pack animal and sometimes carried jutsu scrolls to which you read them through the bindings without them noticing. Finally you found one but there was a problem with it. It was a portal jutsu but it sent you to a random realm instead of back. However the odds of you finding anything better before you died of starvation or neglect was slim. You held on to one last hope for this realm as you created pathways to safely destroy the remaining paper bombs in your system. The hope was Sarah, if she was ok and believed in you that was good enough to keep you here. Finally they let her out of wherever they had been keeping her but your reunion was not as you hoped for.

“Be gone you oversized rat!” Sarah stated as you waited for the delivery of medical supplies that you were suppose to carry. You were stuck frozen for two reasons; first you had never expected her to say something like that, second if you moved from this spot a paper bomb would go off. When you didn’t move she made a hand sign that you knew all too well to which a paper bomb exploded and took out a section of your left wing. You winced in pain but had learned that was all you were allowed to do in response as any cry or yelp would be considered a hostile act. “Filthy beast, do as I say!” she recited as if she was one of them and didn’t know you at all. She then caused another to explode near you neck not even before the other one was healed. You didn’t even wince at this one from the shock you were in. Your one hope for this realm was being shattered. It took the Anko, who was the one loading you up, to stop her as the blood would wreck the medical supplies you had to carry. None of them even had the slightest amount of concern for you and after letting a tear escape they simply laughed that the bloodthirsty animal was feeling sad.

That was the last straw for you. You waited a few more weeks just to be sure Sarah was serious and in the end even read her mind but she was. They had completely overwrote her mind with new data that you had neither the time nor the energy to fix. After another day of slave labor and paper bombs going off you decided to leave through the portal. You didn’t know where it would take you but it was better than here. With that decided you snuck to the practice field after destroying the remaining paper bombs then set up a barrier that served so people could see but not hinder what you were doing. The Barrier itself was noticeable as was the beginning of the portal jutsu you were starting. You of course had to go to human size to make the hand signs but you started, while blocking out the voices of those around you as white noise. Even moving your hands with a dizzying speed it was taking you a few hours to complete despite most of the influential people you knew and had contact with now shouting for you to pay attention. They had long sense realized that the paper bombs they place weren’t working and had gone to a combination of guilt trips and name calling. Finally it was done and you wavered with fatigue at the amount of effort and concentration it took to create it. Maybe in time you would be able to direct it but you had only one chance to do it this time and with it completed you had time while you recovered to address the shouting mob of ninja around you.

“What is that?” Tsunade asked, not really expecting you to answer but thought it might be some kind of massive bomb.

“It is a portal to another realm.” You said between breaths as they slowed. “Having me carry those scrolls was a mistake if you didn’t want me to read them. Paper is not much of a deterrent to get through so I read every document and scroll I could. I finally found this one in a variation of places. Apparently it is hidden because it is one of the most forbidden jutsus there is but the original purpose was to send away rampaging summoning beasts. However it backfired one time and swallowed half the village because of one faulty hand sign. As you can see I have performed it correctly and it waits for me to step through.”

“Enough of your lies. You will come with us now or else.” Tsunade stated as she prepared to detonate the paper bomb by your heart. You had already destroyed it but she might have thought that it being on a separate circuit than the rest it might have still survived.

“Are you deaf? I am leaving this hell I have come to. You are all my own personal demons and I will escape one way or another. If this fails than feel free to kill me. Anything is better than the life I have here.” You said weakly as you started toward the portal.

“Stop! What about your friends and your comrades? Are you willing to just leave all that behind?” came the unmistakable voice of Naruto.

“What friends? What Comrades? You all made it abundantly clear that I am no more than property to you. Property to be used and abused at your convenience and discarded with the trash. All any of you care about is losing a tool or resource. You even destroyed the one hope I had left of this place. With her gone I don’t have any reason to stay. If I really am that much of a threat than the best thing to do is to leave and never come back.” You stated to him and he looked in horror at the accusation, wither the look was by realization or loss you didn’t know but either way it wasn’t going to dissuade you. You tripped and fell as you moved forward again, slowly getting up and moving toward your escape.

“This is insane, you could die if you go through there.” Said Sakura.

“Like you give a dam.” You responded.

“Have you really given up on us just like that?” Kakashi asked. He was always the more sensible one that you didn’t actually mind helping even like this. However he had done his fair share of discipline and corrective action. But as long as you did what he said he was rather pleasant to be around.

“Not on anyone in specific. But yes I have given up. I am tired of being told my existence is a curse. I am tired of feeling pain from those I used to trust and seeing their joyful face at the site of it. I am tired of being starved and neglected. I’m tired of life in general. What kind of people does that to anyone? Even enemies and prisoners of war have better treatment than that. I held out hope that one person was the same, that I could talk to freely and feel… content around. But you even took that away. Tell me what there is when hope, dreams, and life is absent. I don’t expect any of you to believe a word I have said. But I do have one question for you. It might be white noise but I think it is a good question that should’ve been asked a long time ago.” You said

“What is it?” Tsunade asked in an irritated tone.

“This whole thing was based on me eating Kiba, Akamaru, Neji, and Choji. It was said that I implanted the memories into everyone to make it acceptable and believable. My question is: Where is Sasuke?” you asked and most changed faces at the mention of him but didn’t get it yet. “Sasuke left for Orochimaru at the aid of his best subordinates and only Sasuke made it there alive. Orochimaru doesn’t allow weaklings to work at such high stations around him. So if they had any skill at all it would make sense there would have been a fight and Genin level ninja would be lucky to not be injured at all. So if I implanted this whole thing than there is only two explanations that make any sense. Either I ate Sasuke as well and you never found him, effectively tricking the village. Or the whole thing happened as I said it did and I really was just trying to save them. Either way I am sure by the look on your faces that you think I probably did the first option. But there is one way to be sure. If you ever get proof that Sasuke is alive and relatively well than it will prove me innocent and you wrong. But I have lost all trust and hope that you would change after that point. I’ll leave you with that thought and disappear forever. I hope I don’t see you again.” You said as you walked into the portal and it closed around you. You might have stayed if you felt them changing but they were currently more inclined to believe you as a monster than anything else. But as you were incredibly weak after the whole thing you were left dreaming about that along with your usual nightmares as the portal took you to your next destination.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: After Sarah gets out.

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
When you came to you could smell salt and wood. Your heard creaking and splashing and the final clue was that you were being rocked on whatever flat surface you were on. Without even opening your eyes you realized you were on a boat and immediately scanned with your senses for humans. They were all around as they manned the boat but the boat, or ship now that you had a better feel for its size wasn’t moving. It was just rocking in a stationary area. So you induced by the noise you could hear from beyond the wood hull that they were docked. After a careful analysis you opened your eyes and to that the doctor who was looking after you approached. Still suffering from the effects of so many people abusing you, you bolted up as you saw him and got on the other side of the bed. There wasn’t much to shield yourself and the door was behind him so your choices were somewhat limited.

“Hold on there, you shouldn’t be moving yet.” He said as the perceptive man noticed he was scaring you so he backed up and sat in the chair he was previously sitting in. “Don’t worry, I’m not going to hurt you. See, sitting down and not moving toward you.” he said as he gestured with his hands but you also flinched at that as you were expecting a paper bomb to go off. “You must have gone through a lot. Looks like you have more battle scars than a war veteran but severely malnourished. We found you floating in the sea and almost drowning. How about we start out simple with a name? Mine is Doctor Mitchel.” he asked, hoping that giving a little background would help break the ice.

“Max... You’re not going to try and kill me are you?” You asked as you tried to gauge his intensions. It was a good question for you as hunger had left you without enough energy to even change a small amount of your body to a dragon. Not eating for months definitely has its drawbacks.

“Why would I kill you?” he asked.

“I asked you if you were going to TRY.” You clarified.

“I would make a joke about such a claim but from the scares you have I think you might be able to do so, even in your weaken state. To answer your question, no I’m not going to try to kill you. Although if you don’t eat something it is likely that I won’t have to. Why don’t you wait for a bit and I’ll get you some food. But if you leave while I’m gone you won’t have any.” He said as he saw you eyeing the door as he opened it. Reluctantly you stayed where you were and within a few minutes you could smell a healthy meat centered tray of food. The door open again and the steaming tray was place on a table by the bed you were hiding behind. “I’m not going to feed you like that. You have to sit up proper.” He reasoned and with noticeable hesitation you got in the bed and put your back against the headboard.

With a sense of achieving something the doctor came and handed you the tray, noticing that you were preparing to bolt at every move he made but was restraining yourself. You took the tray and you were going to just dig in but you thought that you had waited months for food. The least you could do is not make the person that gave it to you disgusted by you conduct. So you politely but quickly feasted on the meal. It was not nearly enough to satisfy your dragon side but it filled you shrunken belly just fine. Then something happened that made the doctor gasp and run. Your body started healing itself. It wasn’t badly injured but the previously malnourished body was beefing up unnaturally fast and within seconds you were back to normal. As you placed the tray off to the side you looked at your scared body. There wasn’t that many but you had been impacted by so many paper bombs that the transformation couldn’t hid all the effects. Mostly on your chest and back but there were some small ones on your legs and arms but not very noticeable. You did retain the scare that they used to open you up in the first place as it ran jaggedly down your torso.

You were going to stay but you heard multiple footsteps and cries from the doctor at the “freak” in his office. That was all you needed to wipe his mind of what you looked like, left a thank you note, and broke through the wall. You jumped out of the ship and used an illusion jutsu to disappear into the city that laid before you. It was a good thing you were an excellent swimmer because you had to stay under the water for close to a day before things called down. Your Dragon lungs were at their limit when you finally surfaced. You noticed the ship leaving, and with it all the people that might be able to identify you. With that done you headed into the city or village to find out what you could. It all looked so weird but that was a good thing. The more different it was to the Leaf Village the better.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: One Piece.

choices: You tell them about your other side.
You ask them to wait until later.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
Your freedom didn’t last long as some son of the Marine Captain that ran the town started making trouble… again. He was usually idiotic and used his father’s name to get whatever he wanted. You had been in the town for a few weeks and while avoiding him you learned a lot, along with getting to your old self again. You learned about loud noisy things called guns and cannons. The guns were fast, not as fast as you but still way faster than arrows, however they did little more than tickle as the round or at times pointed nature just caused them to bound or slide off. The cannons were a problem as they had more weight to them but they were actually slower than the bullets so if you could hold onto something you could take a full on canon shot with little to no damage.

You read and observed as much as you could so you were well versed with what was happening. However one day that idiot came around and while you were playing with some kids, so their parents could work, he started pushing his weight around. The parents happen to be in the area and you bridged the gap between them as you took most of the beatings that he was going to give to them. However when he rose his hand at one of the kids you caught the sword with your bare hands and snapped it like a tooth pick. This scared him so much that he didn’t do anything but run with his Marine escort. However your antics, cheered as they were, landed you in a cell. It wasn’t all bad as you got daily meals and the small window allowed sunlight in every morning. Unlike your previous discipline this was fairly pleasant until one day you heard noise as fighting broke out. When it was all done you were let go as the former Captain was arrested therefore the charges against you were dropped. You were in the middle of basking on the dock when a strange kid and a man with swords came by.

“What are you doing here?” asked the kid in the straw hat.

“Just soaking in the sun, you?” You asked as you looked over at him.

“I’m just leaving. Hey they said you were a strong guy.” He said in a more of a question format.

“I… well kind of. I got in trouble for breaking that fruity idiot’s sword when he was swing it at a little kid.” You stated.

“What’s so special about that?” the man with green hair and the swords asked.

“He stopped the blade mid swing with the palm of his hand then used only the grip of two fingers to do it.” Said a Marine that you recognized as one of them that had observed it. That fact got you to sigh and the others to look at you as if to ask if it was true.

“They have been itching for me to get out of here ever since. The kids love me but the parents and Marines think I’m dangerous.” You explained.

“Why don’t you come with us?” asked the boy with the straw hat.

“What’s your name?” you asked as if deciding.

“Monkey D. Luffy but you can just call me Luffy. This is the first member of my pirate crew Zoro.”

“My name’s Max and are you offering me a ride or asking me to join your crew?” you asked.

“Well for now you can ride. You have to be strong to join my crew.” He said.

“Fair enough.” You said as you got up and stood a few inches taller than Zoro. “I’ll tell you what I can do on the way. I assume you want to get out of here.” You stated to which you all got on the small boat and let the sail take wind. You were pretty far out to sea before Luffy remembered to ask you about it. Zoro seemed content with his nap but had a little hesitation about the little sword incident they said you did.

“Since I’m going to be King of the Pirates I’m going to need an extra strong crew.” Luffy finished after talking about it. Zoro laughed at his apparent childlike behavior.

“Well I guess the thing I will use most often is that I am… or was previously a fully trained ninja. I have a load of varied jutsu that would be of use to you.” you stated.

“Jutsu?” Luffy recited Zoro caught the ninja part but didn’t quite understand the jutsu word either.

“They are things that make a ninja’s job easier; making clones to right for you, shooting fire, cloaking, fighting with a large assortment of weapons, and a lot more. Pretty much for every situation there is a jutsu for it.” You explained in words that Luffy could understand. You and Zoro learned within minutes that large words only confused Luffy.

“So you are good with a sword?” Zoro asked.

“It isn’t my favorite but a ninja needs to be informed of different fighting styles so he or she can better prepare and counter effectively. The more I know the better I am so I do know a great deal. Although I prefer hand to hand combat.” You explained.

“Can you show us something cool?” Luffy asked.

“I guess show and tell is part of it. Ok first is chakra control. I can use it to walk on certain things unlike anything you’ve seen before.” You state and before he could ask what you meant you started walking straight up the mast then stood on it sideways above them. Then you leaped off and landed on top of the water. “Now every Jutsu uses energy like throwing a punch. The harder the justu the more energy I have to use and the faster I get tired.” You said as you walked back and sat in the boat with them, although Luffy was on his feet with excitement at this point. However despite your impressive display Zoro seemed to know you were hiding something big.

“There’s more isn’t there?” he asked to which Luffy was laughing with excitement at any tricks you would be able to do. He was like a little kid which you thought might make it easier, if you decided to tell them. You had tried both routes of this and you had learned discretion is good but if you were going to get to know anyone they had to know you as well, all of you.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: You get locked up, again.

choices: They need some convincing, especially Zoro.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
You just nodded but in a way that indicated you didn’t really want to share it. But with Zoro’s curiosity spiked and Luffy’s excitement you weren’t going to get out of this one, unless you were willing to fly away but that would just as much tell them than anything else.

“Ok, first though understand that pretty much everyone I have told this to has all feared me for it. So no matter what you hear of see I will not harm you.” You stated and they both nodded in different fashions. “I guess the easiest way to say this is that I am not from this world. I came here after traveling to another world where I learned most of the jutsu I was telling you about. My home realm or world kicked me out because I am… a half breed. I am half human and half…” you stopped as you got a flash back of a paper bomb going off as you tried to explain this in the Leaf village.

“Half what, half what?” Asked Luffy asked excited to see what else you could do. Zoro seemed a little concerned as he started to pick up bits and pieces of what you were saying.

“I am half human and half… dragon. I don’t lose any power by going between the two and I can transform partway, although changing all the way is extremely painful.” You said and their jaws dropped.

“Good one…” Zoro said as he tried to play it off as a joke or bluff.

“I’m not kidding.” You said as you let your eyes glow and sprouted wings and a tail out of your back. This made him almost push off into the water and Luffy’s eyes almost bugged out.

“That is sooo Cool…” Luffy said as Zoro placed a hand on the sheath of his sword as he seemed to be highly on guard.

“Remember what I said? I will not harm you. But if you want to see me as a full dragon now is the time. I doubt it will be too good of an idea to show everyone but this little trick can be passed off as a devil fruit power. However the fact that I can swim would negate it. Do you want to see it or should I wait?” you asked as your tail flexed and your wings stretched from being dormant for so long.

“You can get cooler?” Luffy asked like a little kid.

“Yes but it hurts a lot to do it. Usually I use one of those jutsu to do it fast but it still hurts.” You said which made him calm down a little. As excited as he was he didn’t want you to get hurt because of his curiosity. “But as my captain you can ask me and I will transform for you. Just not too many times, stuff like wings and a tail are easy and don’t hurt but going all the way does.”

“If you are ok with it.” He answered in a rare tone for him since he was pretty much going nonstop since you set out.

“Very well Luffy, Zoro you might want to sit down.” You said in a tone that indicated it would be a shock. He did so but still left a hand on his sword. You flipped out of the boat and onto the water’s surface. You walked a little way than did a few hand signs. With a fiery explosion your massive dragon body was now standing on the water. You waved your wings as they stretched as did the rest of your body. You walked around the boat as if stalking it than brought your head, which was close to the boat’s size or bigger, to them. “So what do you think?” you asked the stunned pair.

“What the hell, you’re as big as a sea king.” Said Zoro, to dazed to pull the sword out that he had put his hand on. By the time he had his thoughts together he realized his swords wouldn’t do that much against you like this so he left them as they were.

“Max, you are soo cool. You’re a dragon and you want to be on my crew. I’m going to have the best crew ever!” he said as he jumped around but in the midst of his excitement jumped off the boat but you easily caught him with your teeth on the back of his shirt. You deposited him back on the boat to which Zoro almost crapped his pants as your head and jaws were mere feet from him.

“As you can see this size is too big to do anything useful in towns or stuff like that so…” you said than with another explosion of fire you reverted to human again. You flapped your wings as you came down to the boat and landed softly on it. Your dragon parts retracted so they could ask questions in a more secure and normal fashion.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: You tell them about your other side.

choices: Money is the way to Nami's heart.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
You explained many things about yourselves as you traveled You all had a lot of time so You got to hear how and why Luffy became a pirate as well as Zoro’s motivation to become the world’s greatest swordsman. After you told you whole story in terms Luffy could understand they seemed to be more accepting of you. Zoro admitted that having someone that could take down sea kings as a crewmate would be useful, not to mention you could spare with him so he could get better. However a little while into your journey you all ran into the same problem of food. You could eat fish if you wanted but cooking them for the others was useless as you had admittedly little knowledge on how. Most of the times you tried you reduced the potential meal to ash with even the smallest flame. So when a bird appear above Luffy tried to get it and got stuck, being carried off. You had all agreed that you were not to go dragon unless Luffy said so and he wasn’t so you and Zoro were rowing to catch him. Eventually a few people that had been drifting out at sea climbed on in your boat and made you both stop to accommodate their threats. The was good and bad to the situation; the bad was that Luffy was now very far away. The good was that you and Zoro didn’t have to row anymore because of the very willing pirates that just tried to kill you. Soon you were at a village just as a huge explosion took out part of the town. You parted ways with your pirate rowers then you and Zoro found Luffy. You got there in time to see a girl putting out a fuse of a cannon pointed at Luffy in a cage. Zoro sped forward to defend the girl as she was about to be attacked while you leaned against the cage. After Zoro was introduced the clown captain named Buggy looked over at you.

“And who are you?”he said with a laugh.

“Max, get me out of here.” Luffy said which answered the clown’s question along with addressing the problem.

“Well if you had grabbed a knife or something when you got captured you could’ve got yourself out.” You said back to him. He laughed at the thought as you put a foot on the bottom of the cage and flicked the top open as if it was a box of made of paper. The bars snapped and the lip flew off and with a well placed claw the ropes that tied him were cut as well. Then Luffy started to inhale in preparation so you, Zorro, and the girl named Nami looked over at him.

“BIG NOSE!!!” Luffy yelled. At this two others came to join him; a man with a giant lion looking animal and some weird unicycle rider with swords.

“Hey look, one for each of us. They are so generous aren’t they.” You said in a mock sense of excitement. However Luffy was genuinely excited. “I think it’s safe to say Luffy has the guy with the clown fetish, do you want the sword on wheels and I’ll take the little kitten?” you asked Zoro.

“Yeah, sounds fair.” Zoro answered.

“Kill them!” Buggy said as he pointed at the thee of you.

“Hey Luffy, you want to see another jutsu?” you asked and his eyes bugged out with excitement. With that you took center stage and with a quick set of hand signs you summoned a large fireball and sent it toward the group of charging pirates. They instantly turned to run but it was too late at that point. The only ones that were left after was the lion pair, the unicycle guy, and Buggy.

“That was so cool!” Luffy said with excitement and you just nervously scratched your head at the compliment as Zoro laughed and Nami’s jaw dropped.

“Hey fur ball. It looks like you and I are up.” You said which got the pair’s attention and with approval and orders to kill you from buggy they charged. IT didn’t take long as the lion was rather weak for its size. He swung once and you sent a punch to his head. You honestly expected him to dodge it but he didn’t, which sent the lion off the roof with his master. “Oops, if I knew he was so weak I wouldn’t have hit him so hard.” You said in an almost apologetic tone. Your expression quickly changed when you heard Luffy laughing his face off. You didn’t know what it was about this guy but he just had an aura around him that made you feel fun, happy, and most of all accepted. You walked back to your spot beside them and Zoro stepped up to take on his opponent. The cycling swordsman was fun to watch but pathetic when it came to skill, especially compared to Zoro. Finally Buggy faced Luffy and was fighting with him while you and Zoro watched. Nami had left and you smelled her scent on the pirates ship than moving slower and dragging a sack of something that sounded like gold.

“Ha now I got you.” Buggy said as he rolled behind you and threatened your throat with a knife to which both Zoro and Luffy just laughed. “What the hell is so funny?!” Buggy yelled. He then responded to a poke on his shoulder and looked as your tail was flattened and was inches away from his face. With the other hand he tried cutting it but you just sliced the knives in half then he backed off.

“I’m your opponent.” Luffy demanded to which Buggy gratefully put some distance between you and continued to fight. At some point Nami came into the battle and gained some respect for Luffy, by the end Buggy was an unfortunate winner of Luffy’s “Gum Gum Bazooka” You were all victorious but because Luffy had knocked out the mayor so that he wouldn’t interfere and get himself killed the town chased your four out of town rather quickly and off you sailed on your little boat with another belonging to Nami next to it.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: They like you.

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
Nami’s reaction to you was what was expected. Even after Zoro warned her on procedures that would make the news easier to see/hear she still fell overboard as when she saw you dragon form. She than remembered your tail in the fight with Buggy. Both Luffy and Zoro were both laughing at her for her reaction and after retelling your story on the way to an island she, like Zoro, accepted you. However for those two it felt an awful lot like the Leaf Village level of trust all over again. The only one you really were surprised of was Luffy. He truly didn’t have a single ounce of fear or judgment in him towards you. He would even protect you, for the most part emotionally, from things that popped up. After landing you all met Usopp and eventually the children that were his “crew”. Luffy, being always honest, introduced you all and as each of them had a title of sorts he said straight out that you were a dragon. At first you had thought it was a bad idea but such a statement is rarely considered true. As time progressed in the village you all met Kaya and her butler who you now knew as Captain Kuro. After a lot of hit and miss with the situation, as everything that Usopp said was considered a lie and Kuro had more respect in the village than any of you. So you ended up facing down the group of pirates with the rest of them, when they finally got there.

“Hey Luffy, you want help with these guys?” you asked as you, Zoro, and Luffy looked down the slope toward the pirate crew that was trying to get to the village to kill the girl Usopp was trying to protect.

“No, I got it.” He said with a fist pumping action as he stretched his joints a little. You nodded and leapt onto the cliff overseeing the area. Draping your feet over it you just watched as the fight started. You laughed when Luffy was hypnotized to be stronger with the rest of the crew. You also offered your help to Zoro but he refused as well.

“So you’re just going to sit here?” Usopp asked.

“Yep. My captain gave me an order so until he recedes it I’m just going to chill here for a while.” You said as you watched Zoro go at it. “Besides they are the two we don’t have to worry about. They would be more hurt if I helped them than if they barely survived. Their honor and pride would take a large hit that they wouldn’t recover from. They would be alive but they would no longer live like we know them.” you answered and both he and Nomi excepted that you were just going to watch so they tried helping in their own ways. When Captain Kuro finally arrived and Nami intervened to wake Luffy and give Zoro back his swords Kuro gave the crew 5 minutes to kill all of you. Obviously that was impossible but you watched anyway. That was until the kids came into play and after being knocked back they were huddled around Kaya.

“Max!” Luffy finally called to which you leapt off the cliff and landed beside him to take his orders.

“Finally have something for me to do?” You asked.

“Keep Kaya and the kids safe with any others that join them while I fight this guy.” He instructed to which you nodded and started walking to your destination. You walked right by Kuro without a care in the world.

“And where do you think you’re going?” Kuro asked in a challenging tone.

“You must be deaf as much as you are weak. I am doing what my captain tells me to do. The only reason I haven’t kicked your ass is because he wants to. Go play with your toys little man.” You said then kept walking. Kuro was so angry that he turned and fully intended to attack you but Luffy was there and they started fighting. “Don’t worry, there is no way Luffy will lose to a guy like that. You are safe.” You said with a smile to the cowering group.

“Watch out!” Nami said but not even halfway into her warning you thrust you elbow back and implanted it into the Hypnotist’s face, effectively knocking him out, as well as breaking all his teeth. “Right, never mind.” She said as she lugged her treasure next to you with the others that joined you to watch Luffy fight Kuro.

“Sorry you didn’t get much action.” Zoro said as he leaned Usopp next to you as well as took a seat against a tree.

“That’s ok, watching you guys have fun is good enough. I’ll just stick to healing.” You said as you touched Nami near her wound and a light enveloped it than transferred it to your body. Kaya and the kids were amazed but Nami and Zoro had already seen it so they just accepted it. You did the same to Usopp and Zoro as you took on their wounds after which your body rapidly healed them.

“That was amazing, but did it hurt?” Kaya asked as she was concerned.

“A little depending on the severity of the wound. But wouldn’t you do the same if you could. Y body can handle the wounds a lot better than theirs can so I did so. We all have our talents that we can use for good, and that just happens to be one of mine.” You stated and you all continued to watch Luffy while he fought and eventually won.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Town of the liar.

choices: Luffy sends you with the others.
Luffy has you help with Krieg's men.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
Another crew member and another surprise, but this time the boat wasn’t small enough for Usopp to fall off. You still had to leave your new ship (Compliments of Kaya) as you were many times larger than it was. You were getting both physically and emotionally tired of repeating your story so Nami was kind enough to do it. After that whole mess was over with and Usopp stopped running from you, half scared and half just wanting to get some attention, he was able to assist on making the crew’s pirate mark. You had to admit that Usopp was a talented artist and complimented him for it as he used your snout to stand on in order to paint one on the sail. You all ran into a few distractions but after Yosoku and Johny jumped on they proved the need to find a cook for the crew, a fact most of you already knew. So they pointed Nami in the direction of the sea restaurant Baratie.

Do to the untimely showing of a Maine ship and Luffy’s misdirection of a cannon ball he found himself in dept the owner for wrecking part of the restaurant. You again offered to help but Luffy insisted it was his dept to pay so you joined the rest of the crew and waited. You all marveled at not only how good the food was but the atmosphere of the place. It was a good thing both you and Nami had enough money to pay for the food the crew ate. Luffy was also almost obsessed with getting the cook named Sanji to join his crew. However after Sanji served a meal to a Ghin from Don Krieg’s pirate fleet none of you were surprised when Don himself came to Baratie. Krieg and his crew were suffering from starvation and Sanji served him something but was awarded a hard punch for his efforts. The other cooks tried to blow him away but that only made him angry. However before he could do anything substantial the owner provided meals to which Krieg took to his men after stating that he would be taking the ship and his logbook of the Grand Line. Before you had much of a chance to talk about it the men sent out a cry, first of joy and determination as they started the attack but was shortly turned to cries of fear and disbelief as a man known as Hawk Eye Mihawk sliced the overly large ship up with little effort and made his presence known.

“So you’re the greatest swordsman?” you asked after Zoro’s dual with him. Your presence that he didn’t even see until this point caught his attention.

“I am and you are?” he said as he observed your every move with those eyes of his.

“I’m Max and I have a favor to ask. If you are truly the best and your weapon is the best sword in the world.” You said and he looked at you for you to continue to which you stretched out your tail and put the end between the two of you. This caught many eyes including his. “Will you try your best to cut the end off? I wish to know if your sword can penetrate my scales.” You asked.

“Under one condition, that you show me how you are able to grow a tail afterwards.” He stated.

“Agreed, just be careful. I have yet to find a material that can do more than scratch my scales in a direct hit. If your sword isn’t capable I don’t wish it to be damaged by my request.” you warned and he smiled than with a grace you had not seen since you had seen Kakashi fight in earnest he sliced at your tail and at the last instant before damage was incurred to the stressing blade he diverted it. He put his sword away and you twirled your tail as you both examined it. The action had left a cut but not anything noticeable. You surmised that as you grew older that your scales also hardened but. You still had softer ones and the flesh under them were definitely weaker than the scales covering it but it was good thing to know that nothing would be able to penetrate them in a straight one attack. “Thank you Mr. Mihawk. With your permission captain I would like to make good on my promise and show him?” You asked Luffy.

“I thought you didn’t want to do it around other people.” Luffy said, a little confused.

“The only one I really care about as far as acceptance is you Luffy. So if they want to fear me as a pirate under you than that is ok with me, as long as you are ok with it. It still hurts like hell but he did do me a favor so…” you answered.

“Ok, just don’t mess with that guy. He’s mine.” Luffy said as he pointed to Krieg. You nodded and after growing some wings you took off into the air and when you reached a minimum safe distance to transform you did so. Out of the massive fireball from your jutsu you fly out of it and circled the area a few times. You roared loudly once for good measure and for the fact that Luffy thought it was cool. You had gotten to roar whenever you transformed for him. On the flip side it got you to release some effort from the pain of transforming. With that done you landed on the water than walked over to Luffy and Mihawk. “You scared everyone silly.” Luffy stated between laughs and the excitement at seeing you at full dragon form.

“Sorry about that.” You said as you looked over the crowd of people and ended with you gazing upon Mihawk. “Well this is where my tail comes from.”

“You’re a…” Hawk eye stated as he looked at you more in awe than in fear.

“He’s a dragon! He has to be like the most awesome guy I found for my crew.” Luffy said with a large smile.

“Well it is a true honor to meet you. I value Zoro’s opinion in skill very highly therefore I consider it a privilege.” You said to Mihawk.

“Die!” Krieg exclaimed as he had just about enough of being ignored. You just placed your tail between Mihawk and Luffy from the spray of bullets coming. They bounced harmlessly off your tail without a care in the world.

“He just never learns does he?” Hawk eye stated.

“Stupid is as stupid does.” You said to which he smiled than left.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Searching for a cook.

choices: You help as soon as you land.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“Hey Max. I can handle this guy. You and the others go find Nami.” He said after a rather large explosion was given to the Krieg pirates as a parting gift from the now absent Hawk Eye Mihawk. Luffy was hanging on to a railing where he had just made a deal that would free him of all duties that regarded paying the restaurant for the damage he had brought on them.

“Ok, just make sure to secure a cook or we’ll be screwed if we try to enter the grand line without one. Unless you are ok with eating raw fish from now on.” You asked rhetorically but he answered it anyway with a shake then a smile of confirmation that he would get it done. You returned to human size and walked on the water’s surface to the boat.

“You mocking me?!” Krieg roared as he fired a volley at you but with deathly quickness you caught every bullet until he stopped firing. Then you displayed your catch by slowly dropping the bullets into the ocean afterwards jumping in the boat and sailing with and away from a very astounded group of people.

“Did I ever tell you how scary you are?” Usopp asked as you used a wind style jutsu to speed up the boat you were on.

“Yes, multiple times.” You said in a board tone as you sat against the side of the boat.

“The stuff you do is far from normal and when you do stuff like that it just makes it more obvious.” He continued.

“Luffy likes it.” You defended.

“Well he isn’t normal either.” He said putting his nose up in defiance.

“Then you should be glad they are both on your side.” Zoro said through coughing up blood from his wounds.

“That’s right I still have to heal you.” you said but he waved you off.

“If it is the same to you, I’m going to keep these. They will remind me of my goal and being slashed by him is nothing less than an honor.” He said to which you nodded and sat back down.

“Do you see her?” Johny asked.

“No. So she just headed off with our ship and gamed you no other explanation as to why?” you asked as you had that feeling of betrayal again. The worst part about it was that you could see her doing it and wasn’t surprised. It was like one of those things that you hope never happens but expect to.

“Yes, she seemed as happy as she is when she looks at treasure.” They reported.

“But that ship is ours. How could she do that?” Usopp asked in disbelief. As a present from Kaya, the ship meant a lot to him in general. You didn’t answer as you looked out over the sea. Usopp was about to repeat himself but Zoro stopped him so he could take a look at you. This was obviously hard for you to deal with and you were visibly distressed by it.

“Who knows? But Luffy said she would be the only one he would accept as the ship’s navigator. The most we can do is hope she has a good reason for it. Luffy is a pretty good judge of character so I doubt he would’ve allowed her aboard lightly.”

“I hope you’re right.” You said in tone that expressed the emotional wear this had on you. You didn’t know wither or not you were going to help or just wait for Luffy’s orders, once you all got to where she was.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Luffy sends you with the others.

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
You didn’t have a lot of say in the matter as far as your involvement. Usopp and the others tied up Zoro after you said that you were willing to either wait for Luffy or for someone to try to kill you before acting. However both of them abandoned ship shortly after a few fish men from Arlong’s crew came to investigate them rying to sail to shore away from Arlong Park, leaving Zoro tied up and you leaning against the side of the boat. You were still in a rather pathetic mood and not really caring if they took you hostage or not. After all they didn’t ask you anything or try to kill you yet so you were ok with them tying you up along with Zoro and taking you to see Arlong.

“We fishmen are the lords of all creatures and to defy us is to defy nature.” Arlong said as he got done explaining why fishmen were superior to humans. You and Zoro looked at each other and after a little nonverbal communication that centered around the ‘is he for real?’ category you both started laughing.

“You think that you so called fishmen are the ‘lords of all creatures’? What a joke, that title has yet to be given and it will most certainly go to someone less pathetically weak than you.” you called out in a clear challenge. Your eyes started to glow and he looked on intently at this new site but the fact that you, as an apparent human, defied him made him understandably angry. You were going to continue but a scent hit you that got you to calm down and look behind Arlong as someone you weren’t expecting showed. Nami was walking forward to join the fray. She then explained to the both of you and Arlong that she was merely using you and the others to further her goals. And before you could recover from the verbal onslaught of what confirmed her status a fishman picked you up and threw you into the water with a force that sent you straight for the bottom and got you stuck in the rock below. You heard laughter as you lay at the bottom with little to no drive to get out. You could, at this point, stay under water for weeks. You almost lost hope for her until Zoro joined you in the water but was retrieved by Nami. You didn’t know why and you thought that just maybe she was counting on you to stay down so that is what you did.

You were partially disgusted by all the fishmen that were swimming around and more than once was tempted to eat some but you would have to transform for that and Luffy didn’t authorize you to do that. So you waited. Buried under some rock you also saw Usopp a few days later fall into the water but after his acting was up he swam away. It wasn’t until Luffy called out your name that you started to move. Heat started to build around you as you began to radiate flames despite the water around you. You had just about enough of these fishmen and would not shy away from killing every last one of them if Luffy asked you to. The sudden increase of power and heat formed a cyclone down to where you were. You allowed the water to come underneath you to lift you to the surface to which you stood on the water with a light layer of flames covering your body and your dragon eyes showing despite your control.

“See you can’t kill him so easily.” Luffy said than stuck out his tongue at Arlong.

“You don’t scare us. We know how to deal with you.” said an octopus looking fishman. He then proceeded to use his mouth like a horn to call a sea king that had a slight appearance of a cow. The creature went straight for you as you were the closest and still on the water. However you simply punched his lower jaw into his upper one and when it his trap was shut you grabbed him by the nose and tossed him with little effort toward the ocean and far out of sight.

“I hope that wasn’t your trump card.” You said, obviously not impressed by the sea king they sent at you. “You fishmen seem to think you are superior to all others. Well I think you’re forgetting about a species that would sooner think a fly was more of a threat than the likes of you, you ignorant pieces of meat.” You said which got Arlong to stand from where Luffy sent him flying. “Luffy, I know you want this guy but do you mind? I think he needs a proper lesson on where the top of the food chain really is.” You asked and he simply gulped than after thinking on it nodded and joined the others.

“You can go all out if you want.” He said with a smile but you didn’t return one. You were very angry at this point. You had heard everything that went on, including their insulting of you as you were presumed dead where you used to be. None of them had actually seen you angry or even how you were when you saw another dragon. You had told them that you could get a little crazy if another dragon appeared but they were half glad there wasn’t any, to their knowledge, and by your loyalty to Luffy which prevented you from adding them to the list of possible outlets.

“You insolent human. One beating wasn’t enough for you. You actually think you are higher than us. However, out of curiosity, what species did I leave out?” he asked as he laughed in an annoying laugh that you had come to highly despise. With a hand sign you exploded and your full dragon form was shown towering above him. You snarled at them as your tail and wings flexed, you also roared at him as if answering his question. You snatched up a few fishmen that had been in the middle of attacking you when you transformed with your jaws, some of them skewered on your teeth and blood running down and into the water. As if in an afterthought you swallowed them down and looked to the rest of the fishmen that fell back in horror of what was facing them.

You didn’t realize it at this point but you were probably using this as an outlet of all the pain that people like him had caused you and others. All the long time of being tortured by the leaf, other dragons, humans, and a long list of things that fueled you at this point. Your teeth were bared at Arlong while your claws flexed and the parts that were on the wall and floor of Arlong Park decimated what was under them. Then you started to drool, but not traditional hunger drool or even saliva for that matter. The drool was like drops of lava but when they hit the ground or sea they burned whatever they touched until it was ash or evaporated. With a breath between snarls you opened your mouth and blew out a massive flow of fire that was more like a beam, destroying and incinerating everything in its path, destroying not only the Park but a few miles after that point. It left nothing after the flame stopped, not even mountains and lakes but you stopped before it reached any human consequences of note. However this left nothing for the fishmen to run into as if the park would’ve saved them from power like that.

“You… Will… Die…!” Arlong stated in a blood rage that previously everyone was afraid of. However in wake of the very large, powerful, and angry dragon in front of them they reluctantly followed him to attempt retribution. They had to jump into the air to get to your head but one had to wander what idiot would want to get near your jaws after you just ate half his crew and destroyed miles of country side with your flame breath. You didn’t really care at this point and with another snap you grabbed the rest of them up and gulped them down, making sure they were dead before they hit your throat by your massive teeth. You’re courtesy for prey was still there despite your current anger.

You made your way on land and after sniffing around to make sure none escaped you calmed down and laid down so your stomach could work on digesting its meal. Your head took the place of the building at the entrance of Arlong park, minus the overall size. Your head wasn’t that big and some would say that it was not proportional to your mammoth body but on the other hand it could easily fit a small boat or a third of the Going Merry in your jaws if you so desired. Combined with almost human sized razor sharp teeth, horns, and those glowing red eyes. You were pretty much the definition of why Dark Hunters were feared on your home realm and sometimes ones that random Dark Hunters visited. However your morals and kindness to humans set you apart from most. You closed your eyes for a moment while you rested your head on the soft earth after your destruction to clam yourself further. That was until a hand was felt on your snout.

“You’re not still angry are you?” came Luffy’s voice to which you opened your eyes and looked at him then the crowd, who flinched at your gaze, than back to Luffy.

“No, I’m fine for now. Just need a little time to gather my thoughts.” You said in your usual kind voice that you used around them. Your former one was not very nice for those in the crowd that hadn’t heard you before. Luffy smiled at this and with his laughter both your spirits got better as well as the others. Finally they rejoiced at the end of Arlong and his reign.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: You wait for Luffy.

choices: The two biggest bounties in the east blue.
This is a no smoking area.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
The villages’ flame of joy was quickly put out by some Marine colonel, the same one that apparently took the money Nami was going to use to buy the village back from Arlong. He was a crooked as a Parine could get with an unhealthy love for money. Luffy and Nami soon remedied that and before too long they had him undoing the mess he and Arlong did, which included returning the money he stole from her. After that point you were asked to stay where you were as the village wasn’t ready to see a full blown Dragon at your size. Even though you told them you could return to human they seemed more interested in keeping the large dragon, that just ate Arlong and his entire crew, as far away from people they didn’t want to end up in the same place. So you went to the ship in human form to wait. It wasn’t that bad and to be honest you had expected such treatment when you transformed so you laid near the back of the ship but on a small platform that allowed you to look over the sea as the boat rocked back and forth in the water. It was relatively quite in contrast to the noisy and partying village. So when Nami was walking on the ship’s deck or on the dock for that matter you easily heard her.

“So here you are.” Nami said as she tried to strike up a neutral conversation with you.

“Where else would I be?” you asked as you continued to look over the horizon.

“Look I’m sorry for taking the ship from you guys.” She said as she thought that was the reason you were more distant, even more so than usual.

“It’s not my ship so it didn’t really bother me when you took it in particular. Even if it was, a ship is easily replaced, perhaps not the memories attached to it but the ship is a material object that I have no emotional connection to.” You said back.

“Then why…?” she started to which you looked at her and she stopped immediately.

“It wasn’t what you stole or even that you stole from us. It was how you did it that bothered me. You didn’t trust us enough to help with your problems and after we made it quite clear that we were pretty close you ripped that away. The worst part is that I wasn’t surprised. I was wishing that my suspicion of you was ill-founded. That my past was just playing tricks on my mind. You seemed too nice of a person to do something like that without reason. Even as we came here I was holding out that maybe it was a weird way of asking for help. But when we got here you didn’t want us here, at all. Do you know what it feels like to not be wanted?” you ended as she started understanding what was bothering you. You looked at her for a few moments than went back to observing the ocean.

“I see. I didn’t know how much pain it caused you. I thought that distancing myself would help my village and keep you all safe from Arlong. I should’ve trusted in you all more. I’m truly sorry for how I made you feel.” She offered and waited nervously for your response. You had unintentionally made it abundantly clear that you were not under Luffy because he was stronger than you so she didn’t want to anger you like she had seen you against Arlong.

“Knowing that you had us at least in your thoughts helps. It might take me a while to get over it but I won’t hold it against you. We all have faults, some bigger than others, but that is what makes us who we are. I wouldn’t have anyone but you as our navigator. Not that it is up to me but Luffy has a remarkably good judge of character.” You answered her and she smiled at you for it.

“I also wanted to thank you for everything. I don’t know if you know it or not but that park was my jail cell for a good portion of my life. When you blew it away it felt like that boundary was gone and I was free. I never thought destruction would or could ever look so beautiful as it did at that moment. It also helps that I won’t have to worry about Arlong coming after me or the village after we leave.” She said with a bow.

“The credit goes to Luffy. I wouldn’t have lifted a finger if he didn’t say so. He could’ve taken Arlong out no problem so it was a favor on my part as well. However for my part I guess I’ll accept your thanks.” You responded as she looked up into your eyes. She let out another smile that it seemed you were over her little lapse of judgment and didn’t require anything from her for your work.

“Well I’ll see you later, I still have some things to do before I go.” She said and after a wave she headed off. It felt better to know that she at least cared enough to come and talk with you. You had enough emotional baggage without adding her to the list.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Nami's appreciation.

choices: The end of a Marine's gluttony.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
You and Luffy were pleasantly surprised when Nami’s paper brought two new wanted posters. The first was for Luffy and his bounty was an impressive 30 million berries. But it was dwarfed by yours. Even though Luffy got the credit for defeating Arlong as the captain. The fact that you were actually a dragon and how much power you displayed brought your bounty to a whopping 150 million berry bounty. Your name on the poster was Dark Hunter Max. The name must have been from when Luffy bragged to the Marine Colonel that was there with Arlong. However they only had a picture of you in the dark with your eyes showing and wings out, again it must have been taken when you transformed back to human after or during the Arlong incident. Luckily for you it didn’t really show you that well unless you were to let your dragon eyes go, any of your other dragon parts. Thankfully it wasn’t posted that you were literally a dragon. You all landed on a place called Log town as a final stop before heading for the Grand Line. Luffy was excited as it was the island that Gold Roger was both born and executed. So naturally he was star struck and raced off without thinking to explore. After that point you all went your separate ways and as you had nothing better to do you watched over Luffy from the shadows like your Ninja training dictated. It wasn’t long until Luffy was on the platform but not in the way he expected. Buggy the clown was able to pin him in the execution stocks. Good thing for you that you had been using a combination of fire clones and transformation jutsus to mingle among the crowd. After Buggy saw and address Zoro and Sanji he asked where you were.

“Over here Buggy.” You said as you stood on a roof near but also a comfortable distance from Luffy, for Buggy that is. “Still have a thing for clowns I see.” You said which got him to turn to you and address your claim.

“You won’t be so smart after I flashily dice you up along with your captain.” He said and looked back to Luffy who was still trying to get out of the bind he found himself in.

“Is “Flashily” the only description you know? It doesn’t get any more interesting the hundredth time you say it. That and do you really think we are just going to let you execute our Captian?” you asked to which he just brought the sword down that he was poising to chop Luffy’s head off. Luffy went from a smile to laughter as you made a hand sign in order to use the substitution jutsu with one of your fire clones and to transform it into a copy of Luffy. The resulting explosion of him cutting the clone’s head off sent him into the adjacent building as well as destroyed the execution platform. For a moment Zoro and Sanji were horrified but was interrupted Luffy’s unmistakable laugh from beside you.

“Wow what a bang.” Luffy said with a laugh before you both jumped down to the ground next to Snaji and Zoro. As part of your public figure you let your eyes glow. “What cool trick was that?” Luffy asked and the other two keyed in to hear.

“I made a fire clone of myself to look just like you. When it was clear you couldn’t get out by yourself I used the substitution jutsu that exchanged the clone that looked like you with the real you. When the clone was destroyed it exploded as Fire Clones usually do when they are forcibly destroyed.” You explained.

“You don’t happen to have any more do you?” Zoro asked as the other Pirates surrounded your group. You smiled and with a whistle the hidden clones took on your appearance, holding a good number of the pirates hostage. However it only took one idiot to panic from the Marine force that was coing in to cause one to explode, and of course it made a chain reaction for the rest of them and effectively clearing the area around you to escape. Sanji than explained to Luffy in terms he could understand that you all needed to get out of there. So you all began to fun with you in the back so you could deflect some stray bullets that Marines and some surviving Pirates shot at you with your tail. One by one the group split up to take on separate opponents until Captain Smoker came around for the two of you.

“This is as far as you go.” Captain smoker said as he stood in your way.

“Can you handle this guy, my punches don’t work on this guy?” Luffy asked.

“Sure, you want to see another jutsu?” you asked rhetorically to which his eyes almost bugged out in excitement.

“I’m no pushover, even for Dark Hunter Max.” Smoker said then used his devil fruit power to reach for you with his smoke.

“You’ve never faced a ninja before have you?” You said and as his smoke reached and squeezed you the shadow clone you used disappeared in a puff of white smoke to add to his. “Earth Style, head hunter jutsu.” Your voice said as you grabbed him by the ankles and pulled him up to his neck in the ground. With him in this position his smoke lost its direction and you pooped out of a hole in the ground.

“So cool!” Luffy said as it took you such a short amount of time to deal with him.

“What the… get me out of here!” Smoker hollered.

“I would but you would just attack us again, even after I beat you fair and square. You are free to try and chase us after you get out but make no mistake, this is not the only trick I know to defeat you with. And I did defeat you this time, wither your pride likes it or not.” You said and with the last part using your tail to cut the ground then barely touch his neck as if to emphasize your point. With that done you and Luffy met up with the others that weren’t already on the ship. Luffy used his long arms and grabbed ahold of the boat and with his arms recoiling brought all of you on it. They all ripped on him for it but Luffy just Laughed and you all soon followed as the Going Merry left Log Town behind, setting a course to outrun the pursuing Marines and get to the Grand Line.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: This is a no smoking area.

choices: Taking care of the Marines and wind boy.
Lost Island and the reutrn of the dragons.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“You know how I feel about dragons.” You growled which got the little girl you all rescued to jump but the others were more or less used to it. “I’m more likely to eat it rather than carry it. Besides a dragon that can’t fly or take care of itself is almost useless, even as food because most of the meat turns to fat and is way less tasty.” You explained.

“But Grandpa Ryuuji is a good and he’s so kind.” Apis insisted. You had stayed on the boat this whole time because you smelled a dragon and didn’t want to have a dragon battle over a city. Not to mention ripping the thing apart at this point would be tragic to the poor little girl.

“I still hate dragons.” You said as you crossed your arms in thought.

“But you ate a whole sea king. You can’t possibly hungry enough to eat a full sized dragon.” Nami stated. She was right, when you all entered the calm belt and was about to be eaten by sea kings you transformed and ripped the thing apart, eating most of it and letting the additional blood and leftovers warn away any others to not come near. It worked and despite giving everyone nightmares they were thankful that the thing was in your stomach rather than them being in its stomach.

“Come on, he’s not that bad.” Luffy said as he looked at you with a smile like he did when he was excited about something. You knew that he would never let this down until you came with him.

“Fine, I guess if Luffy thinks he’s ok than I do to. Doesn’t mean I’m going to like it though.” You said as you got up and they took you to the dragon in question. Zoro and Usopp stayed with the ship and began getting it out of the approaching Marine’s sight and sailing it to Nami’s instruction. Finally you got all the way to where the dragon was and saw it just laying there. You had to stiffen a growl as you looked at the creature. “You know you look pathetic just lying there you know?” you said to him with an added gruff to your voice as you continually tried to resist growling as you spoke.

“Can you get him out of here?” Apis asked to which you looked at Luffy and he nodded.

“It would be easier if he had the strength to fly on his own but I guess he wouldn’t need help if he could.” You said as you approached the large green mass. With surprisingly little effort you lifted the dragon off the ground with the help of your tail and wings to balance him on your back than walked out of the cave so you could do so as a dragon. “Just to be clear to you gramps.” You started as you placed him on the ground. And stepped toward the side of the mountain as Marines were making their way up. “If you harm them I will slaughter you.” you said as you jumped off and flew up to a decent range so the explosion wouldn’t affect the fragile dragon on the ground. Once in dragon form you landed and glanced at a man that was facing the other down.

“Ah you have two dragons. I am afraid they both belong to me.” The man said as he looked at you and the green one that you were heading for.

“Like hell I do.” You said to the man’s amusement. “Ok, everyone get on if you want off this rock.” You said to the others to which they all jumped on your back and you secured them with your spikes. This would be their first flight with you so Luffy was having a blast and almost bursting with anticipation. You then grabbed the green dragon, who was shaking now as you did so, and readied to take off. He was actually smaller than Kara was last you saw her so you were able to hold him in one set of claws while the other three were relatively free.

“Don’t mock me!” the strange little man yelled as he did something and sent winds that were near but not as advanced as Temari’s wind scythe jutsu. The wind currents ruffled your wings but otherwise posed no threat to you. Granted you felt it but you had been on the receiving end of much more powerful wind style jutsus to be impressed by this fool.

“Did he just attack you?” Zoro asked loud enough for the Erik guy to hear.

“Didn’t feel like it. He just blew at me really hard. Do you think he wants me to return the favor?” you asked.

“No, if you blow at him he’ll be flying off the mountain and then you would have to catch him.” Nami said as she joined in on the fun. You were all obviously making fun of him and she wasn’t going to miss out.

“Good thinking Nami. That would be a pain.” You said and with that and a shocked Erik later you flapped your wings out then took to the sky. The resulting shockwave from an uncontrolled takeoff pushing him and the Marines back a considerable amount. You didn’t have to go that high as you just needed to get near the ship to drop the others off. Once you landed next to the ship and snapped the mast off a pursuing one you let the others off and draped the old green dragon on your back, locking him in place and comfortably secure. Apis wanted to stay with ‘Grandpa Ryuuji’ so you let her ride on your back as you walked on top of the water and beside the relatively small and slow ship. “So where are we going?” you asked.

“We don’t know yet. We are trying to find lost island but the only one that know where it used to be is on your back, and he is senile.” Nami answered.

“Great, so in short I have to carry this guy around until he remembers where this ‘lost island’ is?” You asked.

“Yep.” Luffy said with a smile. Ignorance is bliss it would seem as he was just in awe of you both. No matter how many times he sees you like this his eyes always bug out at the site.

“Grandpa Ryuuji said he is sorry that he can’t move that much and that you have to carry him.” Apis said.

“You know I can hear him to.” You told her and she looked at you confused. “We’re both dragons remember. That is why most dragons can read minds. It would scare to many people away if all we did all the time was snarl and growl to speak. That is about all most younger dragons or ones that haven’t learned to speak would do. No matter how hard they would try it takes a lot of training for a dragon to speak in human tongues and some just end up using their mind instead. Sure it drains them more than speaking but they don’t have to train for it.” You informed than snaked your head around more and looked at the old dragon on our back as you walked. “I don’t mind carrying you, I just hate dragons. I don’t know what your intensions are when you regain your strength so I don’t know if you can be trusted. I’ve seen many dragons where I come from gain a human’s trust like you have with little Apis than when they get well from whatever is holding them back they have them as a convenient snack. Well that won’t be happening on my watch.” You warned and explained.

“Grandpa Ryuuji would never do that!” Apis exclaimed.

“Perhaps if you really understood how delicious humans are to a dragon you would change your mind. However I myself am living proof that not every dragon acts on that urge so you may be right. But I’m not going to risk any human’s safety on that slim chance.” You said than turned to concentrate on walking. Apis was going to argue but she had seen the scars of on you as did the dragon while you were carrying him so they left it at that while the others on the ship thought on what you just said. They obviously hadn’t known how tempting they were as food. For now at least they had something else on their mind to help pull away from that, finding Lost Island.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: More Dragons???

choices: In the belly of a whale.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“Max, go get them.” Luffy said after you had all been surrounded by the Marines from branch 8 and the little man with the wind attacks that you called Wind Boy. In the little time you had with Ryuuji as you went to some island and back you had found that he was honorable and worth your time. Even more so when he got off your back and helped protect Apis himself from cannon fire and Wind Boy. Luffy had ordered you to hold back and come aboard the Merry while Ryuuji was with Apis but now that he was down and the fat Marine commander Nelson was even more instant on getting the dragon to harvest the bones for his precious dragonite.

“You got it. I’ve had enough of that fat tub of lard anyway. If he wants a dragon so bad than let’s see what happens when he gets one.” You said than leapt onto the ocean and transformed in close proximity to a few of the other ships so they exploded along with you, leaving the marines swimming and clinging to the wreckage. Your wings waved away the smoke than you picked up Apis from her lone boat on the sea with your snout on her back and placed her on the Merry. You easily deflected the cannon fire from the other ships and answered by breathing fire at them, rendering their fleet to smoking and flaming masses as the crews abandoned the ships in question. You didn’t even need to fly as you walked heavily on the ocean’s surface to the flag ship where Nelson was just to be hit in the side of the head by wind boy’s power from another boat he had acquired after his encounter with Ryuuji, probably trying to get him or you for himself. The portion of his attack that made contact with your eye stung a little but quickly healed, the rest bouncing harmlessly off your scales.

“You’re mine.” He said but with a growl the crew that had rowed him on the condition they didn’t have to continue swimming shook. They jumped out and away from him as you turned and snarled at the tiny man in his little row boat, his unmanned and stationary row boat with your full attention. He tried again but it just bounced off your face as you got closer and as he tried to row away you quickly snapped him and his boat up in your jaws and swallowed the whole thing in one large gulp, probably crushing the boat around him as he passed down your throat and into your stomach for digestion. You then walked over to the ship of the ecstatic Nelson as he ordered his men to unload the cannons on you. But as long as they hit your body and scales there was no real damage and any that did come was quickly healed before anyone but you noticed. They kept firing until you were right in front of them and any more would’ve caused damage to them as well.

“Don’t run, someone help me!” Nelson cried as the others started to abandon ship in little life boats before you destroyed theirs as well or at the whole thing. By the time your head and snout was within touching distance or Nelson everyone was off and rowing away as you barred your teeth and snarled at the fat little man sprawled out on the deck. “Nice dragon, ah… duh… ah… you can have some of my men if you’re hungry.” He offered which only got you more angry and as the men themselves heard it lost any loyalty to him in wake of your presence.

“My name is Max you arrogant tub of lard. I hesitate to eat you just for the fact you would give me indigestion with all that fat on you. So I was going to burn you to a crisp along with your ship. But I think a just punishment would be letting you quarrel with that wind boy as my stomach works on the two of you, very slowly.” You said and followed up with bringing your tongue out to bring him in but for some reason he tasted so bad you retracted it in disgust. “Damn you taste horrible.” You said as you backed your head away and shook it to get the taste out. Just as he was about to say something you snapped forward and used only your teeth to grab him and toss him up. You hoped you could line him up with your throat so you didn’t have to taste him at all. The fat man screamed and waddled in the air as he fell but it was all in vain as you snapped your mouth closed around him and swallowed, only having him touch your throat and thankfully none of your tongue again. The only solace for eating him was that now the two were fighting and making pleasant wiggling in your stomach. You wondered if they had figured out that it only brought acids quicker but you didn’t really care at the moment as you went over to the life boats.

“Please don’t eat us.” the man that you had observed to be the second in command begged as the others shook at your presence.

“Calm down, I have no intension of eating you. Well unless you are like those other two and try to kill little girls and the innocent for fun.” You said and they shook their heads in verification. “Good, I left you all with one ship so you can all return on more than just lifeboats. However if you decide to continue to pursue us before refitting and letting these nice people have their rest my captain may order me to destroy this one as well. I trust you understand, yes?” you asked and they all nodded, as if they would argue with a giant dragon like you that just ate two pains in their sides as well as destroyed most of their fleet. You rose and left them to their work as you walked back to the Merry as Ryuuji already sank after calling the others and you settled in for a very annoying and ruff day. You could already sense the other dragons that were coming and you couldn’t resize until you were done digesting the two you had eaten, or at the very least enough to fit in a human sized stomach.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Taking care of the Marines and wind boy.

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
After a rather unique time to start off on the Grand Line with a island whale, hazardous weather, and other conditions to get used to. The ship finally stopped at an island known as Whiskey Peak and despite all of your cautious behavior you were all welcomed and there was a party to celebrate your group’s arrival but as you soon found out it was a scam by a company known as Baroque Works. You, Zoro, and you could sense Nami were the only ones not affected by their attempt at knocking you all out. You and Zoro had some fun with them as they attempted to kill both of you. 100 of them versus two of you, wasn’t exactly fair on their end but they asked for it. But eventually Luffy got up and was mad at you and Zoro for beating them up, luckily Nami was there before anything got out of hand and you all found out about princess Vivi to which you all got around to figure out what to do.

“This Crocodile guy sounds interesting.” You said as you all talked about what you were going to do.

“Yeah, can’t wait to beat him up.” Luffy responded.

“Awe, so you get the boss. Ok than I get some of his subordinates.” You said as you dealt out opponents with Luffy to the surprise of Vivi.

“Hey, then who do I get?” Zoro asked as you all continued to argue on who got who. “Fine we’ll figure it out when we get there.” He said as you all got onto the boat after Igaram’s blew up and you started to leave. Shortly after you were all introduced to Miss All Sunday. She disarmed everyone but you were hiding and got behind her without her knowing it.

“No one touches that hat.” You said as you grabbed it with some magic and lowered it down to Luffy while holding a kunai to her throat from behind. “That trick of yours is interesting but it won’t work on me. You simply don’t have enough strength to make me do anything with such weak muscles and lack of leverage. However…” you said as you retracted the kunai from her throat and started to walk to the side so her frozen form could see you. “… I highly doubt you were the one to take out Igaram, call it a hunch.” You concluded

“You may wish you killed me when you had the chance.” She warned as you joined the others.

“I only kill when Luffy says so. At least for when I am part of his crew. Besides…” You said then another Kunai was held to her throat. “… I can kill you whenever I want.” You and your clone said together then the clone was gone and she hurried off the ship before another could threaten her.

“How do you know she didn’t kill him?” Vivi asked in a rather angry voice as the others listened.

“Well for one, I got a good look at her power just now and that snot guy is a better candidate than she is. The second is that he was acting as a decoy for you so if she was after you she wouldn’t waste her time warning you.
