She would’ve ignited the gunpowder on the ship while she was on board and baled before we knew the difference, or used her power to kill you when she had the chance. She clearly stated that she had no orders here so it is more likely that someone else was to blame for his boat going boom.” You reasoned and saw Luffy was already confused.

“So she’s a good guy.” He said as he was previously going back and forth between the two.

“Possibly, for now all I can say is that she didn’t kill Igaram and warned us about Little Garden.” You responded to which Vivi nodded in acceptance as she went to deal with her sorrow.

“So what was her power?” asked Zoro as he was wondering how he was disarmed so easily.

“When she did her little trick hands sprouted out of places to knock away your weapons and do what she did. If I had to guess I would say that she can project those hands on any surface, including your body. However they are only as strong as her own arms so she targeted pressure points and such to maximize her effect. If you are ready for it you can overpower her arms and hands, provided you have the necessary strength to do so.” You explained more to the others as Luffy was again lost and was concentrating solely on Crocodile.

“But I didn’t see any hands.” Usopp stated.

“The mist shrouded but of course it didn’t disrupt my eyes.” You said as you flashed them at him.

“What are you?” Vivi said as she saw your glowing red eyes at that moment.

“Here we go again.” You sighed as you would have to explain yourself to yet another person.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Whiskey peak.

choices: They try to fight you anyway.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“I’m going for a walk. Luffy is it ok if I transform and get something to eat?” you asked as you all anchored and was introduced to a land that everything was pretty much giant sized. That got him happy to go exploring and your mouth to water since you didn’t really have a substantial mean since you ate that Sea King. Sanji was good but you needed a lot of food to satisfy your belly. Not that you needed to as the sun was usually enough but it would be like eating salad, the same salad, every day and only ¼ of what you could eat. Especially if you were craving a burger or steak.

“Sure.” He said as he was already excited about exploring the new and exciting place. You were going to ask Sanji if he wanted you to bring you back anything for his stores but he and Zoro had already made somewhat of a competition out of it so you got off the ship and went to dragon form before sneaking into the jungle.

You were still way taller than the trees when you stood up but when creeping you could hide, even in the day time, pretty well. You stalked a few large animals and took down one of them with a long neck. The others around were going to charge you but you let out a roar and they ran, leaving you to enjoy your meal. When you dug in it was better than dragons as they were usually the only thing that had this level of firmness in the meat and other organs. Usually the stuff you ate was so week that you hardly noticed when you chewed it and judged on the burst of flavor and your enhanced perception and senses to tell you when you had bitten all the way through. But with dragons, and other with stronger hides, your teeth and mouth could feel when they sank in. The feeling of this meal and the flavor was even more so than the dragons that you had feasted on years ago. You thoroughly enjoyed your meal until you had chewed and swallowed every last bit, even the bones as you had the habit from your home realm too much into your being to stop now. You took your time to take in the feeling of a full belly for once and attempted to take a nap.

“Max!” yelled a voice that could only belong to Nami. You woke from your slumber and looked up at the sky to see how late it had gotten. You had slept for a few hours and perhaps they had reset the logpost already and Luffy had finished exploring. You had thought that it would take longer for Luffy to satisfy his curiosity so you reluctantly got up and went over to where you smelled and heard the group, although you smelled a few more in the area as well.

“I thought you guys said I could go an eat and explore.” You said as you found them in a clearing with some weird wax contraption that was spinning and spreading some kind of hardening wax over people and by the look of it would solidify them into statues if left unchecked. “What the hell did you guys get yourselves into this time?” you asked then looked around to see 4 people you didn’t really recognize. Sure you were briefly introduced to shot guy and the overweight skinny chick but there was also a guy with the number 3 made into his hair cut and a girl with a paint set. They were all looking at you at this point. Then you saw that one of the figures that was being covered by wax was a giant and the other by him was one that was deeply unconscious. Those that didn’t know you like this were all wondering what the hell you were and why you were talking to them.

“Yeah, yeah, just get us out of here.” Said Zoro and this was when you noticed the scent of his blood was in the air.

“How did one of these weaklings cut you?” You asked.

“What I’m not cut.” Zoro stated.

“Really, and the blood I smell in the air is what, an extra pouch you keep around for drama effect?” you asked sarcastically.

“He tried to cut off his feet so he could fight.” Nami said as if that was more pressing than their current situation, which Princess Vivi was almost flabbergasted in shock from. Not to mention she hadn’t really gotten used to you being a dragon yet.

“Great, now I got to heal that to.” You said as you walked forward and reached out a claw to touch the three under the bowl. You transferred their injuries to you as well as the wax covering which you easily broke and did the same to the two giants. The giant’s injuries took more of a toll on you than anything but not much of one. That and Zoro’s leg chopping kept you from moving for a few seconds while they healed but they all got away from the twirling thing. “And what is this thing?” you asked.

“You disrupted my art!” said the 3 guy.

“Who’s the weird guy? And can I trash this thing? It is ruining to mood around here not to mention getting really annoying?” You asked Luffy.

“He’s mine, you can take that thing down.” He responded as he got ready for another round with the 3 man. With that you poked it a few times to see how strong it was and it fell over but that only spread more wax all over the place but you saw that the fire on the top seemed to get rid of it. So you breathed a layer of fire over it until it was gone than laid down on the now open grassy area.

“Who are you fire one?” said a giant with a sword.

“My name is max, I’m a… well that is a little hard to explain. But for now I’m a dragon.” You said

“You’re what made that loud roar before aren’t you?” the other giant asked.

“Yep, that was me. I had just caught my lunch and wasn’t going to give it up to some of the others here so I scared them away. I thou…” you stated but was interrupted by an explosion against the side of your head that that made you and the others that had moved to sit between you and then giants, look at the group of others. “That wasn’t very polite.” You said after moving your snout inches away from the snot guy and sniffed, taking in his scent.

“Maybe you should eat them.” Nami said as they all had just about enough of them. Although she knew how you felt about doing that to humans in general. However this was more like one of those joke/threat things.

“But I just ate one of those huge long necked things. I’ll be full for a while, but I guess there is always room for some taste humans.” You said in a tone only the crew knew as the tone you used when playing along with them. It wasn’t the first time they had scared the crap out of someone like that. “But maybe barbeque, that one smells like he just wiped himself down with mucus. What do you think, got any preference on how you’re prepared?” you asked as you shifted your focus to the panicking group of humans as Luffy continued to fight and the others couldn’t decide what was more interesting; your threatening with their squirming or Luffy kicking the 3 man’s ass, sometimes literally.

“Come on already, he doesn’t have all day if you want to make it as a proper desert.” Zoro put in as he wasn’t going to miss getting his dig in.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Little Garden, big meals.

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“AH!!!” the three yelled as they almost tripped over each other to get away from you. After they were far enough away you all started laughing and watched the rest of the 3 man’s fight with Luffy. It was interesting but in the end Luffy was far too powerful for him and was defeated and likewise ran away from a threat to feed him to you, you even gave the guy a long lick to make him squeal like a girl as he ran.

“I told you I’m already to full to even transform back to human form. I can’t eat all that too.” You said as Luffy was wondering why you wouldn’t eat the leftovers of Sanji and Zoro’s little hunting competition.

“Fine.” Luffy said as, against his wish, you all left the rest of the meat behind. Although you cooked some of it for him to eat instead of the rice cracker he had. He was the only person you knew that rivaled you in hunger, well not really but as close as a human could get. It wasn’t long until you were at the sea and a large fish thing came out of the water.

“Just keep going straight.” The giants said as you could sense the energy coming from them. Energy that would easily take down the giant (even by your standards) fish but not save their prized weapons.

“Wait, let me take this one. You all got to fight and I need to burn off some of this food.” You said to which the lowered their weapons and you moved in front of the ship as they brought it to a stop. “Although it is a shame that I don’t get to eat it. You both don’t mind fish for a while do you?” you asked.

“Not at all, we will have a grand feast.” One of the giants said and the other joined them in their peculiar laughing styles.

It didn’t take long as it didn’t have anything to help it in a fight other than size. You gave it a warning snarl anyway but it paid it no heed as it opened its huge mouth to swallow you and the ship, although it would just barely be able to take you in, maybe not all the way but definitely in two gulps. That is if you didn’t retaliate with a severe flame breath that pierced right through the fish and left a gigantic hole in the thing. The attack left a shockwave and the fire could be seen probably for miles. With that done you went over to the sinking carcass and grabbed it with your jaws, lifted it up just barely, and threw it so some of it was on the shore for them to handle.

“That was so cool!” Luffy said as he looked at the size of your conquered foe as the others, even the giants, did in shock and awe.

“Ha, you really are something.” Said one of the giants.

“Thanks, see you later.” You responded then joined the others as they were already sailing away from the island.

“So can you turn now?” asked Luffy referring to your ability to turn human.

“Not yet. I have to digest some more of my meal first. If I don’t than it will make me explode in my smaller human stomach.” you said.

“How much did you eat anyway?” Zoro asked as if judging the time until then.

“One of those long necked things. Haven’t had that much to eat since that sea king all that time ago.” You said which caused their jaws to drop. They knew you were capable of it but it was still surprising to hear it none the less. Vivi was still on the emotional stated that she thought you might think one of them would be a good desert. But she was slowly coming around.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: They run off in terror.

choices: Someone shooting at you from the island.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“Sure, I have a logpost.” You said as you were asked by some invading pirates that just woke you from a nap. You had learned to make them and with all your combined knowledge and Nami’s guidance you were able to make them. But Nami was currently sick at the moment with something that for some reason your body wouldn’t take in. There was only two ways to save her. The first was you eating her and hope your storage stomach would generate enough healing power to save her. For many reasons none of you wanted to explore that option. The only other way was to find a doctor. You had flew around and as it was quite cold you were keeping your dragon parts out while human to help maintain your heat. Your dragon body was superior in climate control so the more draconic you were the more comfortable it made you, at least in the current situation.

“Then we’ll be taking it.” A man named Wapol said.

“I don’t take orders from you, lard ass.” You said with the men that were pointing guns at you quivered as you were halfway intimidating looking with your wings flexing, your tail waving, and your eyes glowing.

“I am the ruler and you will…” Wapol started but you had no intension of letting him finish in any polite manner.

“Luffy, we still have a little bit to go so if they attack can I?” you asked as you still needed permission to engage, although you were all talking about allowing you more free reign as far as fighting was concerned.

“Yeah, they look weak so go ahead.” He said back to you and you all could see that it was driving Wapol crazy to be taken so lightly.

“Shoot him!” came the order as he was so mad that they were quivering. You each handled them differently. On your end you caught the bullets and cut the weapons apart with your tail until all they had left was their bare hands. You only attack actual people when they were foolish enough to do it to you as you walked over to the even angrier man.

“Come on big mouth time to go flying.” And with that you grabbed his upper jaw as he tried to open up and take a bite out of you. With this hold you took a preparation step then threw him into the distance. After that the men that you all were previously fighting retreated and after threatening the crew went to find their lost leader.

“Who was that?” Sanji asked and you just shrugged, which was slightly comical as you looked so threatening but was acting so gentle and casual. That display just proved yet again that you were far above them. Sure they would have been able to do what you did, but not so easily, well not most of them.

“He sure was annoying though.” Said Usopp as the danger was gone and he was prime to look ‘cool’.

“Which way now?” Vivi asked as they were all pulled back to the current task to get a doctor for Nami. The question was directed at you as you pointed and kept pointing in the direction until they were on course again. After that brought your wings around you and sheltered from the cold and settled in to continue your nap. Only to be woken by…
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Nami is sick.

choices: A new crewmate, Chopper the tasty snack.
The medical witch and her desire for scales.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
Not long after a segmented napping session as they would often wake you to make sure they were going the right way, you were all looking around the shore as you pulled into the snow covered area. Luffy was excited and had to be constantly reminded that they were there to find a doctor.

“Great. We haven’t even said hello and they already hate us.” Sanji said as Luffy and the rest of the crew were told to leave because ‘your kind aren’t welcome here’.

“Now you know how I feel” you said as it had been brought up more than once that it was natural for people to fear and despise you, until they get to know you that is. At this point the only people on the ship that was nervous around you was Vivi’s Duck.

“Well maybe it would help if you didn’t have your wings and tail out.” Usopp suggested.

“Are you kidding. It’s freezing out here.” You returned but any further argument was ceased as a gunshot was heard and the bullet hit the deck near Sanji. Soon after and before you could do anything about it another fired and grazed Vivi, who was holding Sanji back from retaliating. Strange thing was that she continued to do so afterward and calmed both sides. She really was an amazing woman in that regard.

“Max, can you carry her since you are so warm?” Luffy asked as the group finally agreed to escort you all to the village while Zoro stayed behind to watch the ship. And what he said was true. While you yourself were freezing your overall body heat was just like your dragon form, just not very insulating on your behalf. In fact it was the main reason why you couldn’t where traditional clothes for too long. The clothes would eventually burst into flames so you just settled for the clothes you could make via your scales and transformation jutsus.

“Yeah, no problem.” You said as you picked her up and wrapped your wings around her and you, which kept her warm and you along with her. Your tail shrunk into your back until only a small one remained. The people had already seen it so suddenly having them disappear may be more than they could handle. It wasn’t long before information was gathered and Luffy was off is Sanji and Nami to deliver her to the doctor. You offered to fly her up there but it was decided that your dragon form would be too much. But Luffy authorized your to stay back and protect the town if necessary, but only in human form while he didn’t limit your dragon parts from coming out.

“Max do something.” Vivi said as soldiers came in under Wapol’s command to seized the towns while he went after the three already up the mountain. You were going to do something anyway but now there was an avalanche heading toward the town.

“OK, ok, everyone stand back.” You said as you started making hand signs then slammed your hands into the ground. This made a large fire dome envelope over the town, burning so hot on the outside that the avalanche evaporated as soon as it hit the wall of flames.

“What is that?” asked one of the town’s people.

“Fire barrier, just a little something that I invented a little while ago. Let’s see old lard ass or his boys get passed that.” You said as you called Wapol by the nickname you had given him. A few were frightened by your disrespect for such a dangerous man but the others just laughed at this and went on there business.

“So is that one of those jutsus?” asked Vivi asked as she was constantly trying to look past your other side as much as she could to deal with you personally.

“Yes. While fire is easier to do because of my… other side, this is a barrier jutsu just like a shield but using an element rather than a piece of wood or metal. The tricky part is making it one way so it doesn’t burn stuff on the inside.” You answered.

“Well it is amazing.” She said as the wall of snow hit the thing wall but burst into the air, making a loud crash and sizzle that started the events for the for that part. However with the town sealed away they were all spared any unnecessary losses.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: sighting the island.

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“So you’re the new guy.” You asked as you all set sail from Drum Kingdom towards Alabasta. Chopper was both strange and interesting. On one hand his reindeer scent made you hungry but it was evident that he was half human, not only by confession but by his reasoning and other abilities. Although he acted a lot like you and was afraid of rejection more than anything.

“I’m Chopper.” He said back to you as you looked at him while the others talked and observed.

“My name is Max. It is good to finally have someone else like me around here.” You said with a smile.

“What do you mean by that?” he asked as he looked at your tail and wings. You were still in a cold climate so you still had them out to warm yourself and what not.

“He means he is half human to, just like you. Can you guess what his other half is?” Zoro said as it got a shocked look from chopper.

“I… I… don’t know. Is it something bad?” he asked.

“That depends, if you were a normal reindeer or an enemy than yes.” You said cryptically as you all were getting a little bit of fun from his emotions on the matter. At one end he was happy and the other scared, along with a few others in between. He would react with dances or shivering depending on what emotion he was projecting in an almost sequential pattern. It was quite comical and entertaining to watch.

“And why would it be bad if I was a normal reindeer?” he asked as he had clearly always thought the opposite.

“Same problem with them, I would eat you for a snack.” You said in a casual voice which made the statement that much more unbelievable but sent Chopper running in circles as there was nowhere to run on the ship to get away. The rest started laughing and he finally stopped and was ushered back to the group.

“Why don’t you just show him and get it over with?” Nami more commanded than suggested. You looked over at Luffy to which he nodded with a smile and you got up.

“Don’t worry, no matter what I am you are still part of this crew so you’re safe.” You said and he just nodded like a bobble head doll. You then jumped to a safe distance on the water which caught his attention right away. But then you exploded and transformed which caused Chopper to go comically running around the ship again. You stayed at a distance until he calmed down and was able to take you in. After a few moments of them explaining you and your past with him you were ushered forward and you brought your head close to the ship so your eye on that side was visible. “As the ship’s doctor you should know about all your potential patients as well as you are a part of this crew now so you should know me for what I am. Like I said before, it is good to finally have someone like me around here, someone that is half human that is” You said to him.

“So you’re not going to eat me or anything.” He asked.

“Well I wouldn’t say that. I… well as the others said I have a second stomach to heal people so I can’t say never and I technically have to eat you to get you there. But as far as thinking you as food. You can count on it, I will never eat you in that way.” You explained and a part of your past hit him and you as he said that. It was obvious, even with their limited sightline of you that you didn’t like the subject spoken like that. When joke threatening with others; fine, but not when it came to serious debates about people close to you. In fact you had been one of the biggest voices to keep Nami out of your second stomach when she was sick.

“Oh, ok. So can you breath fire and stuff too?” Chopper asked as he tried to change subjects.

“Of course, I’m a dragon, fire breathing comes with the package.” You said and blew a little off to the side and his eyes began to sparkle.

“Can I…?” he started but stopped.

“As long as Luffy says it’s ok than you can.” You answered as most of the crew liked to go flying eventually.

“Yeah! Let’s go!” said Luffy and was the first to jump on. Chopper’s jaw dropped as he didn’t even ask and you already said yes. Soon they were all on, after dropping anchor, and only awaited him.

“I’m… not sure if I’m comfortable with…” he started but Luffy gave you a few pats on the spike holding him on. You looked at him and he gave you a signal and they all watched as the rest of the crew knew it well. You had to do this to Nami, Usopp, and Vivi as well. With a quick snap you sent your tongue out and grabbed the fidgeting Chopper and brought him in your mouth. After that you shot it out and placed him on an open spot on your back and secured him with a spike. Before he could say anything you took off and went high into the sky.

“He got you good.” Luffy said between all of them laughing at the freaked out Chopper.

“So how was it?” asked Nami as she put a hand on him and he began to calm down a little but still was obviously shaken. “I mean the take off. You know you would never had gotten on if he hadn’t done that and his claws are too big to catch you. In fact his tongue is actually quite comfy if you get past the whole in his mouth thing and the drool. So do you like it up here?” she asked more directed this time in her question.

“You mean he did that to you to?” Chopper asked.

“The first time is always the hardest and yes he did that to me, Vivi, and Usopp. You should’ve seen him but we all love it up here and the next part to.” She answered.

“GO!” yelled Luffy before Chopper could asked what the ‘next part’ was. You suddenly sped up and began giving them a ride that made roller coasters a joke and at speeds that they didn’t even dream of going. It took some doing before you knew what was enjoyable and what was bad about such rides. But with Luffy’s help you figured it out and you finally heard a comforting sound to you from the new comer of the group; laughter.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: A new crewmate, Chopper the tasty snack.

choices: asks you to stay with the ship.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
Since you couldn’t go into town without causing a scene, mainly because the word had spread with the suspicion of what you are. Not only that but there was a better picture of you and a picture of you as a dragon on the new wanted poster. Because of that little fact your bounty went up to 250 million berries. An amount that got Luffy both jealous and proud at the same time. He often would run around broadcasting random facts and teasing both you and the crew as they each had a different response to the news. So you were assigned to ship guard duty both at sea and when docked. Although sometimes you had to catch Luffy from flying in wherever he was when he came aboard. Such was the case this time as he finally found you after you all started to sail away without him in order to protect both the ship and others as you tended to destroy impeding or threatening forces. Shortly after someone jumped aboard and almost landed on the deck but as he was someone you hadn’t seen before you rushed forward and grabbed him by the throat and over the sea so he didn’t make it on the ship.

“Wait Max, he’s my big brother.” Luffy said as you growled at the choking pirate. This snapped you out of your aggression and quickly set him on the deck.

“Your brother…?” you asked.

“His name is Ace and he is Luffy’s big brother.” Zoro explained to which you nodded and bent down to his slumped form as he clutched his sore and bruised throat.

“My apologies.” You said to him.

“Quite a welcome you have there.” Ace said as he got up.

“Well Luffy charged me with the safety of this ship a little while ago. It has been a while since an enemy got on board on my watch or damaged the Going Merry.” You answered then your attention was snapped to enemy ships closing in and not just one or two either. “Well, duty calls.” You said than jumped off the ship and onto the water’s surface and started a series of hand signs, “Water style, multi water dragon jutsu.” You said as multiple water dragons emerged from the ocean around the attacking ships and within seconds tore them apart, sinking back into the ocean after their assault as you jumped back onto the ship.

“That was so cool!” Luffy said as you wiped off your hands of the residual water. You smiled at the compliment and went to go sit down near the edge but still in the group.

“You must be Dark Hunter Max.” Ace said as the others started talking about what had happened that day.

“I told you my crew was awesome.” said Luffy like you would expect from brothers.

“So I hear you are good with fire.” he more asked than said.

“Comes with being a dragon, and I hear that is your devil fruit power” you responded.

“Well thank you for keeping my little brother safe, I know he can be a handful most of the time.” Ace said as the others talked amongst themselves.

“Well he is Luffy, but I can honestly say that it has never been a chore. I picked him as my captain for a reason and he is very… special in that regard.” You returned.

“What was that reason?” he asked, probably in an attempt to duplicate it and have you join Whitebeard and him.

“Well as you can imagine I cause quite a ruckus and panic wherever I go. Without going into my past it is safe to say that most people have two attitudes when dealing with me. Usually it is kill me or something like that, and or use me. But I am not treated like an actual person, even by the other crew here they have their reservations and handle me with care. Like a powder Cage ready to blow at the slightest false move. Luffy is either to stupid or just that kind and accepting that those thoughts have never entered his mind.” You explained.

“But then why aren’t you a Captain? I can imagine there are a lot of people that would join a crew that has someone like you as its leader.” He asked.

“I admit the thought does cross my mind every once in a while. But believe it or not I am quite young and have no desire to rule anyone. If I had one wish it would be to have friends that accept me for who I am, rather than accept me or fear me biting off their heads. Luffy is the only one that I have found that fits the definition perfectly so I would proudly serve him and protect that connection and the people close to him. Unlike some, if Luffy tells me to do something I know it is a pure desire of his and pure in its motives. I don’t have to worry about killing innocents or other immoral practices that others order their crew from time to time.” You Explained.

You both talked for a while longer about things that ranged between Luffy to food choices. Although you were understandable hesitant to share curtain things and he understood. Finally after a bit of sailing the ship docked at a port and Luffy…
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Luffy's older brother.

choices: You save Vivi and destroy the bomb.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“Very well Luffy, but only because you asked. It gets boring on the ship all by myself.” You answered and he apologized for that but promised that you would be able to do something ‘more funner’ later. So there you were on an otherwise empty ship as you soaked up the sun. Most people complained about the sun as it was in this country and you had to say that if you ever ran out of drinking water you might as well. However, other than that, you thought the sunlight was extremely refreshing. You used a jutsu so that only members of the crew would know where the ship was but otherwise it was completely invisible, so much so that you Ace asked where it was the moment he got off.

During your boring detail you protected the ship only once as there was a sand storm that would’ve caused some damage but with you knowing all of Gaara’s moves you easily deflected it with a ‘Sand Tsunami’. Otherwise the most strenuous thing you did was clean the mast and sails. Even though you took your time it took all of a few hours to get the Going Merry so cleaned and such that it was as if it was on display. Either way you were just taking a nap in your spot and a few days later when desperate cries came and broke your concentration.

“Max! Whatever your name is where are you?” you looked up to see some kind of seabird/man anthro thing carrying Luffy and he was pretty banged up, more so than you had ever seen him before. You were about to grab him and slice that birds head off. But the way he was carrying him didn’t suggest it was what an enemy would do. You answered by taking the genjutsu down and he almost flew smack into the mast. He circled once then landed on the deck where you soon joined him as he placed the unconscious Luffy down. “He said to bring him here than passed out. I hope you are worth it. We don’t have any time to lose.” Said the bird man then took off. You wanted to asked him something but he was fast and you were to destracted to get the question off before he was too far away to hear it. Ever since you set foot in this country a scent would hit you every once in a while. It was just a whiff on the wind and to most animals would be unnoticeable but you could never forget the scent of leaf village ninja. Through your slow and mostly boring time alone on the ship you had smelled it more than once. But it was shrouded and never more than a wisp on the wind and only when the wind was blowing perfectly.

You immediately transferred the wounds Luffy had to you and luckily they weren’t as bad as they looked. Before he even got up your body was dealing with the last cut, as it disappeared to Luffy’s opening eyes.

“Hey, so that bird guy got me back… and you healed me up.” He said as he flexed and stretched his body as if almost dying didn’t even register to him.

“Yeah that guy dropped you off and headed toward where you guys said the palace was. I assume you want to get there but what’s the news?” You asked and Luffy explained the basic idea of what he knew, which wasn’t much.

“Can you fly me there then help out with the war thing?” Luffy asked.

“I can but what about the ship? I can’t hide it from that distance.” You asked as it was you appointed task.

“Don’t worry about that.” Luffy said with a smile and you couldn’t help but smile back. “But I still don’t know how to beat that guy.” He said as he looked at his fist than at you confused face. “I fought Crocodile but he has a devil fruit power to turn into sand. Every punch I threw he just turned into sand and I couldn’t get a hit.” He explained.

“Sand heh, well than you either need an extremely hot flame or water.” You said and you could see he wasn’t following you so you led him off the ship and onto the sand with a bucket of water. You then built a quick sand castle that had the same basic problem he said. “Ok so he is basically like this right?” you asked and he wacked the castle only to have it reform and like he had seen then he nodded to you. “Ok, since Ace would be the only one with enough fire to do the first option I’ll just skip to water.” You said than poured the water over the castle. The castle couldn’t reform than you gave him the signal to try again and he did. This time sand flew everywhere as he destroyed the castle.

“Oh… that’s what you meant. So all I need is water.” He said then ran onto the ship. What he came back with actually surprised you. You usually didn’t expect intellectual decisions from him but he had a barrel of water strapped to his back along with a hose to lace his body with water if needed.

“Impressive, awesome idea Luffy.” You complimented.

“Can you give me a ride to the palace?” he asked.

“Definitely.” You said as you were more than willing to leave the ship and finally get some action. Although you could still smell that scent every once in a while of Leaf Village Ninja. You hoped that either your nose was wrong or that they weren’t in the direction you were headed.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: asks you to stay with the ship.

You are almost blown apart and barely survive.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“Max, catch her. I’ll go kick his ass.” Said Luffy as you neared the square where the fighting had escalated to an all out war. The two sides clashed and as an attempt to quell her free spirit, Crocodile had pushed Vivi off the ledge while dealing with the ruling body of the country. You had passed the bird man on the way there as you were much faster than he was and he would never get there in time or you would’ve let him catch her. She still really didn’t like you that much, especially as a dragon.

“Got it, go get him.” You said as he was on your tail at the moment. You both thought that it would be easier if you could send him over there rather than him jumping. So with a flick he let go and was flung at an insanely high speed toward Crocodile as you went and caught Vivi on your head. It was the only spot, besides your tongue, that was soft enough to cause no injury. “You know you really should grow some wings if you plan on jumping like that.” You joked up at her as she was still slightly in shock from your presence. Your speed was at a level that very few of the fighting men in the square saw you fly through.

“You… and Luffy… are here?” she stuttered as she was not expecting it.

“Well that’s what friends do you know. So how do you want to handle this? Luffy told me to Catch you and to help you so what do you need?” you asked as she was still on your head and even though you slowed down was still holding on to the smaller spikes that were displayed on your head.

“Crocodile says there is a bomb in down there and it is in that tower somewhere. We also need to get them to stop fighting but my voice won’t reach over all this racket.” She explained.

“So what you need is for them to listen to you. I think I can help a little.” You said than dove down to where the center was and roared as you flew over the square once, letting a few fireballs hit in places that didn’t hit anyone but scatter the dust that was impeding sight. This effectively got everyone to back up and panic enough to give you room to land in the center. After a rather rough landing where the ground shook violently you flexed your wings which vacated the remainder of the flying dust and sand out of the way then roared again, causing absolute silence in its wake. No one dared approach you or say so much as a word as you snarled at both sides then put your head to a height that Vivi could be seen by all and stable enough for her to stand on. “You’re up princess Vivi.” You said to which she stood and noticed the stage you were giving her.

She gave somewhat of an emotional speech in which she addressed many things which brought the perspective leaders to the center and you let her down so she could speak with them. Search parties went out to find the bomb and it was found at the top of the clock tower. They were trying to find ways to destroy it and even though you offered to destroy it for them, most didn’t trust you and Vivi was still one of them. So you, as requested laid down at the far end as more of an insurance on the fragile peace that was occurring. Some might have been willing to cross their perspective leaders on starting the fight again but with you there supporting Princess Vivi they were not willing to cross a dragon of your size. Unfortunately the bomb was made with the anticipation that you would get involved so it was bigger than anything they could handle.

“Um, Max?” Vivi asked as she approached you. Even though she didn’t really take a shine to you, even now, she was the only one present with the others still fighting their opponents that would come anywhere near you.

“Hmm?” you responded as you opened your previously closed eyes to her. They, light normal, were too intense for most to handle so you were so close to be taking a nap. Although your emotion on her still not accepting you was easily betrayed in your expression. There was also the scent of the Leaf Village Ninja that was very strong in the area but you still couldn’t locate them as of yet. The scent its self was getting you to have a rather saddened mood but with her still acting like you were an enemy was also draining on you.

“I feel a little guilty for putting you over here then needing your help. But none of us can even lift the bomb and it will be going off rather soon. We need to get it out of here or everyone inside this city will die. Can you help us with that?” she asked. You looked at her for a prolonged amount of time than up at the bomb in question. They had moved things away from it so you could grab it mid flight but you could tell that it was a nasty little thing and if it blew while you held it than it would be no better than that paper bomb going off near your heart. You definitely would be dead and Luffy and the others didn’t stand a chance if it went off in the city.

“I see your point. I will help as much as I can. After all, Luffy did order me to help you and I obey his orders.” You said as you made it clear that was one of the only reasons you were doing it. She felt a little ping as it seemed to be that you were moving away from trying to persuade her that you were ok, or even to the point that she was like the other non crew that you meet. You didn’t really care what everyone else thought of you as long as Luffy and the others were ok with it. She had never really treated you like part of the crew even though you had made it a point to treat her like one. With no further explanation you rose and took off toward the tower and the bomb. The move caused a little bit of panic from those guarding the device but you again didn’t really care at the moment. You had way to many things on your mind to be concerned about it.

You reached it and grabbed it gently but flew away as fast as you could and as high as you could in what time was left. When you reached a height and distance you thought it was ok to let it blow you tossed it into the air in an attempt to use your fire breath to destroy it and further deter the blast away from the city. But before you could let out the flame in question the bomb blew. The only question was; were you far enough away at this point to be ok or did it do some damage?
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: You save Vivi and destroy the bomb.

Wake to early from a commotion.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
The blast was by no means a small or weak one. If it had been in you than it would’ve disintegrated you, scales and all. So the fact that you so close only provided a stage in which the destruction could wreck havoc on your body. The first thing to go was the thinner and comparatively weaker membrane between the bones on your wings. Followed by severe burns and what small amount of shrapnel that flung into your, at this point, tender flesh. Luckily enough you had closed you eyes so they were ok but, again, you were highly burned everywhere. If you had known before hand you would’ve put a layer of spikes over your body but you were only able to do so to cushion your fall. You had remarkably little amount of say on where the explosion was forcing you to land but you did do your best to direct yourself to a deserted part of the palace with no living stuff in the area of impact.

The impact from your fall put a crater in the once beautiful garden and left you sprawled out as the last thing you could do was retract your spikes and try to get up. The last sight you saw was someone flying up through the air as if someone had forced them up from underneath the bedrock of the city floor. You were to out of it to see who but judging on the possibilities and the people capable of such a feet you guessed it was the crocodile guy and the person to give him his temporary flight status would have to be Luffy. As the initial pain of the fall left you were greeted by new internal injuries as your ribs had punctured more than a few organs. The only luck you had in this ordeal, other than still being alive, was that the sun was shining on you despite the rain that now dotted the earth below. It allowed your body to start healing itself as you went off to sleep.

”Stay away from my patient!” said a voice that you knew to be Chopper’s. It was the first distinguishable sound you had heard sense you had fallen asleep and fluttered in and out of consciousness. The scent on the air was so strong with the leaf ninja that your body was always on alert. You meant what you had said before. You would rather die than go back to the whole paper bomb slave thing and leaving your body open to people when their scent was around was not comfortable.

“Just let me help. I’m a friend of Max’s and he’s hurt.” Said a voice you also recognized but not to a name. Your body was still too weak to do anything but sit there and listen. The only clue you had was that the voice brought dread to the surface of your mind.

“No, I have his wings just right for them to grow back and I won’t let you touch them. The rest is my job, I’m his friend and I never heard of you before. That is unless you are one of those mean ninja people, then you’re definitely not touching him.” He defended. Like the others you had told Chopper your past and he had almost went on a morality speech for a week on how wrong it was for a doctor to sew bombs inside you at all, and even worse to use them to make you a slave.

“It seems you have everything under control so I’ll just leave you to it then.” Siad the voice with a slight whimper to it. You heard a sniffle as the sound of footsteps entered whatever building was in front of you. You were obviously big enough for it to be a few buildings and while you didn’t underestimate them you guessed that they didn’t move your massive body from where it was when it landed. You felt a prick near a still tender portion of your leg and after that you went back to sleep. Chopper must have given you a sleeping cocktail of some kind so you didn’t move around and disturb his work. You resigned to it, even though your sleep was plagued with nightmares but none that you hadn’t seen before.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: You are almost blown apart and barely survive.

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
Yet again you wake but this time you are able to move and stretch as you woke. Most of it was out of habit; first checking the area so no one got hurt, then doing your stretching, lastly settling down and taking in the area around more directly. As you came to the settling down part you saw that the guards nearby weren’t really keen on seeing you yawn or move for that matter so they ran into what you assumed to be the palace. You took this moment to look at you wounds and what still needed to be healed. Your new scales were coming in nicely and the old ones with the burns were being discarded. Your wings were still a little tender but back to their normal shape and overall look, no holes or extra chips to note. It wasn’t long after you started to stand that Chopper rushed in.

“No, you shouldn’t be moving so much just yet. You need to let your injuries heal more before risking to use them, more particularly your wings.” He instructed.

“No complaint from me, feels like my body is telling me the same thing.” You said after a wince to your attempt at standing. Your immediate danger was passed but your body promptly let you know that it was far from healed yet. Unfortunately one of your bodies tells was also your stomach as it complained of its empty status with a loud rumble. “I’m guessing that means I need to eat something.” You said as you looked around nervously.

“Wait here, I’ll go get you some food.” Chopper said and for once was in full doctor mode and didn’t even register that you could just as easily swallow him down, as the reposted guards seemed to be aware of. Chopper ran off to get his patient some food and you were left by yourself plus the two terrified guards. It was at this point that you started to try and locate the source of these ninja that were so close that you could almost taste them. Your combination of heightened dragon senses made it so you could virtually look through walls and such. Finally you found them but they were far enough away and through enough walls that you couldn’t get more than a general idea on what their condition was. There was a few of them and they were in a dungeon of sorts. “Sorry it took so long, I forgot that you need more food than most and like the raw stuff.” Said a voice that interrupted you concentration. You looked down at the now nervous Chopper as he stood beside a fish twice his size as well as a few camels and a cow. They were chained to a pole in front of you and it was a good thing because most, except the fish looked like they were trying to get away from you.

“Thank you Chopper, but you don’t have to stay and watch me eat. You two either.” You said and included the guards in the deduction and they eagerly left you to your meal. After they left you dug in quite literally into your meal. Although you were also courteous as to not get blood everywhere so you waited to do the chewing and savoring until they were inside your jaws and sealed. This also kept the other meals from panicking and trying to run. You saved the immobile fish for last and was grateful as was your now filled stomach. Granted your stomach was smaller than your body portrayed because of your constant lack of filling it but it still felt good as you cleaned what was left of your meal from your jaws and the ground. You didn’t need to give the image of you talking with a set of bloody jaws. They left you for a while then came back and after standing at their post and Chopper doing some last checkups you were left to get some rest. But you had slept for what apparently was a week and was not really that tired.

This allowed you to think on a few things. One of which was why the ninja were here and how they planned to get back. You had just developed a jutsu from the original that allow you to direct where the portal went in a reverse or forward sense. However you had yet to test it and to be honest you really didn’t want to go back to their realm nor did you want to leave this one. But they were obviously here for a reason and you didn’t know what it was, not to mention they probably didn’t have a way home if they just got here and it had been a few years so you could only imagine what they wanted with you and those images weren’t that good.

“Are you just going to sit there and brood?” asked Zoro as he must have seen your thinking face and for a while.

“Huh? What do you mean?” you asked as you weren’t sure to what he was referring. There was a few things that were weighing on your mind from your old ‘friends’ to Vivi’s lack of trust which resulted in you being injured in the first place.

“You’ve been through a lot and I am well aware of our guests in the dungeon. I suspect with that nose of yours you can smell them as well. They asked for you and at first your name was good enough to get them in the door. But as they revealed themselves and their relation to you we had them arrested. Some even tried to persuade us that you were dangerous as their main selling point and that we didn’t know what we were dealing with. We all remember what you said they did to you so we left them in there until you were ready to deal with them.” He explained which gave you some depth in this situation.

“I honestly don’t know what to do with them. It is insanely difficult to perform the portal jutsu and I never thought they would even care I was gone minus losing a military asset to the village. However despite their treatment of me they aren’t bad people so they shouldn’t be jailed and at this point I really only care what you, Luffy, and the rest of the crew think of me. Between the wanted posters and rumor they couldn’t really do any harm if they spread around that I am whatever they say I am. Not to mention that the dragon secret is already out so it isn’t like they are going to persuade you guys with information.” You thought out loud.

“And yet, if I had to guess they could probably do some nasty damage on a physical level if they were left on their own. From observing jutsu from you I doubt to many would be able to stand against them.” Sanji said as he and the others from the crew joined the conversation.

“Max you’re ok!” said Luffy yelled and jumped on your head, stretching his arms around your snout in a hug. You waited to move until he got off.

“Yep, Chopper’s medical skills made me as good as new. Just need a little more rest and I’ll be ready to go.” You said and got a round of bashful words from Chopper as he tried and failed with hiding the emotions he got with such a compliment.

Anbu Black ops from multiple villages. BAD
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
It took another day before you were at full strength and Chopper gave you permission to start moving around. Of course you options were limited as such a large dragon so you went to human but left some of your dragon parts visible like your wings, tail, eyes, and claws. You retracted them when necessary but for the most part you were allowed to walk around in this rare form of relaxation, but only in the palace as the Marines were looking for you and the crew. For now you were in a type of meeting/throne room with the others and the king as you talked about your guests before they were to be brought in.

“So are they good guys or bad guys?” asked Luffy as he seemed to only understand that part.

“I don’t know. Like I said; their overall presence is good but I have yet to figure out why they are here. It is hard for me to believe that they came all the way here for me and even harder is if they came to apologize. They may be just trying to retrieve me as a military asset and if that is the case the solution is simple, we just leave. They may be ninja but they have no idea how the sea works inside the Grand Line. We have a log post and the best navigator in the world but they are new so we could easily get away.” You said and Nami blushed a little at the compliment.

“Wait, didn’t you say that it was hard to do that Portal Jutsu? What are the chances that they can get back?” Zoro asked.

“You’re right. It is insanely difficult and takes a long time to perform the portal jutsu and if even one hand sign is off by a fraction than it could backfire and swallow everything in a one mile radius into an unknown realm. The odds that they have developed a way to get back are slim to none. I have just recently perfected a sort of reverse in the portal opening so I could get them home, but it would mean I have to leave as well.” You said with a little bit of sorrow. It was obvious that you liked it here despite wanting to return home.

“What! Why do you have to leave to?” Luffy asked as he understood that part but, like the others, he didn’t understand why such an action would require you to leave.

“If I make the portal it will expand and pull everything into it until I enter it. My body is like the key and will open and close the portal. So I would need to walk through it in order to close it. Unfortunately I getting back here isn’t as simple as getting back there.” You explained and saw their confused faces again as you said that part. “Think of the Portal system like a sting tied to your ship while going through the Grand Line. The island in back of you would be easy to find while the island in front would be a guessing game at best. I know it isn’t exactly the same but that is the closest thing I can bring up that might explain it.”

“Huh?” Luffy asked.

“If he helps those ninja to get home he can never return. But if he doesn’t than they are stranded here.” Sanji explained so Luffy understood it. Your wings and tail flexed and cycled as you thought about this more deeply.

“Well, from what your fellow crew have told me about them and what they did to you it would be well within your right to leave them here. I can help you as a returned favor for saving my Vivi.” The king offered.

“Thanks for the offer but it would do little good. The way it is, they are ninja and probably could easily escape from any binds you could hold them in. They aren’t at my level but they are by no means lightweights. I don’t want to cause your kingdom any further trouble. Plus if they are highly influential people in the other realm it would be like taking you or Luffy from this one. For all my blabbering on the wrong they did to me it would be hypocritical to do the same to them. I think that if they are people I know well and they are here for a good reason then perhaps I should take them home. If they are here for bad reasons at all then I will help you confine them so they are unable to get out in a timely manner.” You advised.

“So you’re going to be leaving?” Luffy asked.

“We’ll see, I don’t want to but if you or some of the other crew were in their position and unable to be King of the Pirates, wouldn’t you like to return. So I have to at least be ready if that is the case.” You answered and with the little reference to the King of the Pirates in there he understood. As the rest came around the King ordered them brought in. The door opened and in walked…

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
You were slightly shocked at who came through and also saddened at the sight as well. There was only one person in the group that you didn’t really know that well and that was a white skinned kid with a plastered smile on his face. But with the other three there and the looks they gave you it looked like you were going to have to leave this realm. They had been stripped of all ninja tools as well as had their hands bound. Kakashi had his headband and mask still on but the rest were limited to their normal clothes, minus any weapons or armor.

“Now that the issue with the civil war is done and Max has fully recovered we can now address this issue. Before you speak know that is boy has done a lot for my country and the people of this world in general for me to simply allow you diminish his name in anyway. Despite him being one of the most heavily wanted pirates in this world he is a good person and we are not here to debate that.” The king started in a formal manner and you felt good that someone was sticking up for you like that. But your fully showing dragon eyes were locked on the ninja and you noticed that they had already freed themselves of their bindings but kept their positions like good ninja would. You could also see that each of them were a great deal stronger now than before and Naruto had more control or he would’ve bursted into the King’s talk halfway through.

“We understand, we are not here to cause trouble.” Said Kakashi with a slight bow of respect.

“So are you going to take Max away or what?” Luffy Blurted out as the possibility was weighing heavily on his mind. While you weren’t the captain you were a large part of his crew, literally.

“What! No we don’t want to take him by force or anything. Although we thought he would be hiding out somewhere so we were going to invite him back. But now that he appears to have friends here we can’t simply tell him to come with us.” Sakura responded as she defended their morality more than anything.

“And yet you force my hand.” You said as you rubbed your head as if nursing a headache.

“We aren’t forcing you to do anything.” Naruto contradicted as he didn’t understand what you were talking about.

“It’s very simple. It took me the entire time from when I got here to now, minus the time it took to do other activities, to develop the portal jutsu so I can gain at least a little control over it. I can now go forward as well as back. They way you have mastered it is probably the default one and it can only go forward. So I need to open a portal if you intend on returning which means I need to come with to close the portal. Unfortunately that means I can’t return to this realm after I send you all home.” You explained.

“Is it really that bad in our realm?” asked the new person to which you looked at him than at Kakashi as if asking for his name than back at the boy.

“His name is Sai. To put a long story short he is taking Sasuke’s spot on the team.” Kakashi stated.

“Well then Sai then my answer is yes. Here I have a close group of people who accept me and trust in me like family. I don’t care that other people are afraid of me or labeling me a some vicious man eater here because they are ok with it and I just chill with them most of the time. Back on your realm I am on the opposite side of that spectrum. I am feared, distrusted, shunned, and well over a dozen other descriptions that I would rather not be affiliated with. Despite any effort on my part I will still be considered like that. Odds are that after I return I would just open another portal and return to my home realm. After all it would be easier to return to this realm from there rather from your realm. In the end I have more pull to stay as far away from you all for me to even consider it. On top of all that, I’m not even considered a person in the Leaf Village, just a weapon or piece of property to do with as you please. You tell me if the realm is really ‘that bad’.” You said then calmed down and took a breath from the little bit of urgency you used throughout the small speech.

“Max, couldn’t you teach the portal jutsu thing to them and they do it?” asked Zoro.

“No, it is a jutsu I developed around my specific style of chakra. It would take years to research a way to let them use it and even then they would require an insane amount of Chakra to pull it off, and that is if they don’t miss even a single hand sign. The way it is now I haven’t tested it yet so it is a little iffy.” You answered in a more calmed tone than before.

“Wait!” Luffy said then ran out of the room. “Usopp!” he yelled and the long nosed pirate went in after him. You heard some noise and the beginning of a mess only Luffy could make than after a rather long and uncomfortable silence he called the others in there as well, except you. Then they all came out and luffy was holding a black, rolled up, piece of cloth. “This is for you.” he said with a huge smile like he did when he was giving something special to someone. He unrolled it so all could see it. On one side was the mark of the Strawhat Pirates, and by default your mark. On the other side was a small but detailed picture of each of them, mostly accurate except Usopp made himself in a more confident pose than he was known for.

“For me?” you asked as if unsure what they were implying.

“Well it looks like you’re going to be leaving so Luffy had Usopp paint this so you can always remember us.” Nami said with a similar smile to which you laughed and they looked at you as if you were making fun of their gift. Kakashi and the others stood silent as they were glad that the hostility was not on them for the time being.

“Looks like great minds think alike.” You said as you patted a chest that you had brought in with you and had previously told them that you would explain it later. They walked over and gave you the flag to which you graciously excepted it then opened the chest.

“First up is for Luffy. I know your problem with swimming is a hassle to deal with so these are for you.” you said and gave him some new sandals. “They allow you to walk on water like I do.” You said which got his eyes to sparkle as he did when you showed him a new trick.

“Next is for you Zoro. I know that sword is special to you so I got you two others that I made personally.” You said and gave them to him. He opened them and looked at with a curious look as he checked out that the blades were different colors; one completely black and the other blood red. “The Black one was made with my dragon scales and bones so it is not only the strongest material around it also has most of my abilities in it, I wanted it to surpass Mihawk’s blade but in its own way. The second is made from by spikes and tinted with my blood. It is fashioned as the sharpest sword in the world and can easily cut through another sword without losing any durability. I call the black on dragon scales and that one Dragon’s Blood, you can name them differently later if you wish.” You explained and he looked in awed silence as you continued on to the next person.

“Nami, I notice that you love your maps but two things bother you. One is that you lack the fighting prowess of the others and that they are always losing or breaking your stuff. So I give you this.” you said as you gave her a pen. She looked at it then clicked it once to see a pen tip come out but them pushed it further in and a edged pole came out but the blade that she now held wasn’t cutting her. She pressed the edge of it like a pen and it went back to the pen it was originally. “I made that pen with a few enchantments. The first is that it will always appear in your hand when you need it no matter where it is or where you are. The second is that it will never run out of ink or break unless you plan on cutting it with Zoro’s new swords but even they will need a few strikes to get through. Next is the blade will never cut you and because of the other enchantments your grip is never compromised. Looks like you already figured out how it turns into a bladed pole and because it will never cut you but it will cute everyone else they can’t use it against you unless they want to risk cutting of their own hands.” You said and she gazed at the thing, dropping it a few times and having it appear in her hands.

“Usopp. I give you these two things. A bottomless bag and a new slingshot. The bag is pretty easy to figure out and the slingshot is so hard to pull back that Luffy would barely be able to get it an inch, so it is pretty strong. However I made it so you can do it effortlessly. It also auto loads anything that you have previously programmed into it. I’ll let you figure that partout as well.” you said and he took them like the others.

“Sanji I give you this multi tool. Like Nami’s it will always appear in your hand when you need it and it is hard to break. However this one will change to what you need as long as it is within reason as well as self clean in a fraction of a second. So you can literally go from slicing a fish up to gutting a pig to digging a hole and back to scooping a soup with it and it will clean and change to suit what you need. “ you said as you gave him his gift and he tried and successfully changed it a few times.

“Lastly, Chopper. This is for you.” you said and gave him something that looked like a pan. “It is a multi display tool that, like theirs, will come to you whenever you need and is really hard to break. You can access any recipe you store in it or look into a patient to see what’s the matter. I’ll let you play with it so you can see all the cool little features you can explore.” You said and his eyes sparkled at this.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Kakashi, Naruto, Sakura, and Sai. GOOD

1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“Please return their belongings while I am opening the portal. It will take me just under an hour but I have to concentrate on it so I’ll be putting up a barrier just to be safe.” You requested and with the King’s order some of the guards went to do as you inquired. You left the others to look at their gifts while sticking your on your back so you didn’t forget it. Then you formed a barrier and started to make the portal. Good thing you used Jutsu on a normal basis or this would’ve been really difficult. You lose all sense on what was going on around you as you completed your task but when the final hand sign was done a black hole opened. You took a few breaths and eased your muscles before putting a barrier that only allow the ninja and you to cross, you didn’t need one of them to fall in accidently and get stranded with no way back, and with that done you deactivated the barrier around the area to address the group.

“So that’s the portal you spoke of.” Zoro said as he looked at the shimmering black hole as it flexed and waited to be filled.

“Yes, this will take us back to their realm. I would ask if you guys wanted to come with but you would stranded there and away from any hope of your individual dreams.” You replied then after another round of goodbyes followed the others through the portal and waved once more before it closed, leaving them with a smile. However inside you were not very happy about leaving. And you really didn’t like the sight you saw when you came out of the portal. You had a good number of ninja around you and all ready to fight, weapons pointed at you. It wasn’t the whole village by any means but a large section of the military force.

“Sorry about this but the Hokage wanted to see you as soon as you got back. They weren’t sure exactly how good of mood you would be in when you returned so they prepared for the worst.” Kakashi said as he and the rest of the team were the only ones not pointing some kind of weapon at you.

“I kind of guessed this anyway. I guess I should go see her if I’m passing through.” You said and followed him through the village. The encirclement that was there accompanied you on your way and maintained a presence even inside the building as you went to Tsunade’s office. They all had those eyes that they used to use on you before you left. Although since you weren’t planning on staying long you didn’t really care at this point. They opened the door for you and followed you in where the two elders were standing with Donzo and Lady Tsunade behind her desk. You walked to a more central position in which most guests stood then stopped, waiting for them to continue. It was clear through your still showing dragon parts, the movement of your tail, the flexing of your wings and the glaring of your glowing eyes that as much as they were on edge you were also ready to defend yourself if necessary.

“So you decided to come back.” Said Tsunade.

“Only because I had little choice in the matter. For whatever reason you sent them after me and risked the portal jutsu they were stuck unless I opened a portal back as it is different than the one you all learned. Yet again I am ripped from a life of acceptance and plunged into… this one.” You said with the last designation as if you were spitting something foul from your mouth.

“Regardless, this is where you belong. We have many tasks that have piled up in your absence. You will be…” started one of the elders as she was clearly trying to regain control over it but you nipped that in the butt right away as you didn’t even let her finish.

“…Leaving for home as soon as possible. I have no intention on staying and doing anything you have for me to do. Do not mistake my complacency in retaliation as submission. I am being civil for two main reasons. The first is that I owe that much for this realm teaching the way of the ninja to me. Regardless on how I feel about the rest of you the skills and jutsu come in handy. The second is that there are still a few people here I respect even if I don’t trust them. They have earned it and to top that point off it is in my nature to reward such respect with action.” You declared with a slight growl on your tongue but it disappeared when you gave Kakashi, Sakura, and Naruto a nod as you designated the people you respected.

“You are a Leaf Village Ninja, which means that you receive orders from the Leaf Village. Or have you forgotten that is what a ninja does?” asked Donzo in a way that felt like he was trying to gain control over you.

“Oh I remember alright. And I do believe it was you that resigned my status as a ninja and named me a mere possession of the Leaf Village. I am neither at this point and I will not be controlled by you, ever.” You said with a glare.

“Now you wait just a minute …” said the other elder before you made a quick hand motion that paralyzed the three that were trying to lay claim to you.

“Silence! I will hear no more of this. I came as a favor to Kakashi fully aware that you would try to secure my cooperation but even I thought you would go about it in a more linguistic manner. Now that I have answered your question on wither I will serve you or not I will ask my question. Where is Sarah?” you asked which got a fearful face on those that could still move.

“What do you mean?” asked Tsunade.

“It is an easy enough question but I will explain it further. I am going back home to my realm and although she is also been part of this world I feel obligated to seek her out and offer her a chance to return home as well. I am also curious to see if she has worked over your mind tampering yet. So I will ask again. WHERE IS SARAH?”
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: Leaving the life of a pirate.

choices: You enter with no further interuptions.
Donzo tries to take control of you.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
“Max… I…” Tsunade started but then collected her thoughts. For whatever reason she was stuttering and you hoped it wasn’t bad news on the Sarah topic. “When you left we had a lot of catching up to do. Initially it was only the loss of an asset, as you have said. However a while after that we began receiving intel on Orochimaru as well as his activities. Sasuke’s name kept popping up and originally we had thought you ate him and were blinded by arrogance in that fact. We were reluctant to believe that we were at fault but part of us searched anyway in case it was some kind of new threat. That is when Naruto and more than a few others ran into him and saw for themselves that he was still alive. Of course Naruto and Sakura always believed he was ok but that one instance hit the rest of us pretty hard, Sarah most of all. She began having flashbacks of the memories we covered. Eventually we cleaned the cover off so she could see her past clearly.” Lady Tsunade said than stopped as she looked down at her desk and looking passed it as if remembering her past.

“You must understand.” Kakashi started and you looked over to him as he explained while Tsunade gathered he next thoughts. “Sarah was very skilled and well beyond most of us at that point. She had reached the level of Jounin shortly after you left and didn’t slow in her progression. She, like you, was someone we counted on as almost a trump card. But when she learned what we did to you and what she did she grew angry and didn’t take it too well. Some say it was a miracle that we didn’t lose anyone during the ordeal as she was on a raged path, but I say that even in her state she was still aware enough to avoid casualties.” Kakashi finished as he saw Tsunade was ready to take over.

“Are you going to make me ask a third time?” you asked as you were getting tired of their sidestepping in this issue. You had let go of the elders but still kept a grip on their ability to speak. They seemed to get the hint and just stood there instead of making a scene.

“After she went on her rampage she barricaded herself in the forest of death and kills almost anyone that we send in after her. He last message to us was that she would stay in your former home and not let anyone touch it. Beyond that, well you know full well that place is dangerous. We don’t know her current location or if she is even alive. But as of 6 months ago and one dead Anbu later we suspect she still is in there.” She answered to which you looked out the window in the direction of the forest of death. Your eyes followed a few heat signatures but even for you, at this distance it was too far to judge them more than just life signs.

“I guess I won’t have to convince her that much to get her to leave then.” You said as you thought about it and what you should do. “I had half expected that I was going to have to refurbish her memory by myself and that she would be more partial to this realm as she had lived in it for such a long time.”

“Are you still planning on leaving?” Asked Naruto.

“Of course, I have no reason to stay. Originally I stayed because I thought I had no choice. As I grew in the village I grew some respect for certain people and even grew to care for them. I even thought that it was ok to just live instead of holding back all the time. To put my hope and trust solely in this realm and just stay here. But that is far from what the reality was and I learned that the hard way. The moment I let down my guard completely I was reminded why I had it up in the first place. As I said before; this place was and still is my own personal hell, why wouldn’t I want to leave?” You asked.

“But you said you respected us.” Said Sakura.

“Respect because I know some of you are actually not half bad and underneath it all you are decent people to a point. But I am far from believing that you people will ever change. If you want to put a picture on it that think of it this way. If Orochimaru kills Sasuke in front of you just for the fun of it and to see the look on your faces. If you are able to completely forgive him regardless if you think he is going to change than it will be near what you are asking me to do for you people. At least on my home realm people treat me the same no matter what. It is much better than getting stabbed in the back. Now I have lingered here on this subject long enough. After I give Sarah the option of returning with me I will make my decision on wither I am leaving or not.” You said then, as they figured they didn’t have any other options, they let you go but as before they sent a large escort with you as you walked to the Forest of Death. To you that just solidified their relation to you as you made your way to the one person you might still like in this realm.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.title: In the forest of Death.

choices: They use everything to stop you.
They appologize and wish you luck.
1323211112112211122111111112112112122212.content:
Surprisingly you entered into the Forest of Death without incident, probably because you had half the village escorting you and no one would go in the Forest of Death. You entered and immediately saw some traps and easily avoided them. Some you saw people in them and you noticed that the ones that were more successful were the ones that combined ninja tactics with what you taught her way back when you taught her how to hunt. You were following her scent as you could see her at this point but now that you purposefully set off one of her alarms you walked around the forest, waiting for her to show herself. With two Kunai thrown at you and lodged in a tree you stopped for her to address you.

“This trick again. Preying on my weakness for him won’t work a second time.” Said a feminine voice you knew to be Sarah’s. It had been a while but you still recognized her voice and tracked her scent without moving, once you walked to a little more open area but still covered with trees so you and her could move.

“So they tried that as well. Not surprising I guess as they do seem to use trust more as a weapon than an asset.” You said back.

“Huh, you even sound like him to. But that just means you are a more skilled ninja than the last one.” She said as she moved her position to prevent normal people in your position from detecting her.

“How about I solve this little debate you are having right now.” You said then transformed with an explosion that made her loose her footing and fall but smack onto your snout. She tested the what she landed on before looking at it. She knew the feel of your scales very well, even if it had been a long time. You brought your head down as you laid down then with a flip of your snout you threw her just enough so she could land on her feet in front of you. Like you her body was now trained to catch its self when in a like position. She slowly turned around as if in partial shock until she was standing, quivering at the sight of you. Not a fearful quiver, or perhaps it was but not like normal people. She was not afraid of you as a dragon but as a person. She probably had a great deal of guilt from all the things she helped do to you. Even you flickering her off your snout was a huge difference. You used to just let her lay there as long as she wanted. For you to remove yourself from her touch was a hurtful experience for her. “Hello Sarah.” You finally said which seemed to push her over the edge and she just fell over. You were sure you had something to do with it but she also looked really exhausted as if she hadn’t gotten a good night sleep in a while.
